I purchased form Crutchfield because you are a trustworthy source.  I have had to call technical support twice.  This is a very nice service, especially to those of us that are new to these new complex receivers.  All of your reps were very helpful from point of sale to technical support.

Delivery of the product as stated when I placed my order. Product well packed and protected. Instructions included as well as customer support available to answer any questions. I have to include that they have all the necessary wire harness to fit the factory plugs eliminating the need for splicing cables. Thank you crutfield. As alway the Crutchfield staff are always friendly and helpful and knowledgeable.  Both in the sale of the product and with follow up technical support.

Crutchfield is the best run company in the United States. They have a very good selection of products, they deliver those products when they promise, they provide "real time" support from a "real person", and they stand behind what they sell -- meaning if something goes wrong, they take care of it. If all companies ran this way, America would truly be great again.

I've been a crutchfield customer for at least 15 years. Their custom harnesses and connectors along with a wide selection of adapters are the main reasons I buy from them. Plus, their pricing is competitive, their automated recommendations for installation accessories has never failed me...and I've ordered many car stereo products for at least a dozen cars, maybe more.

Bought some door speakers and install kit for a great price, installed myself and am looking forward to buying the rest of the speakers I need from you guys. Speakers were packaged well and shipped timely. What more could a guy ask for.
Trustworthy expertise combined great prices and the best product support available for home and car audio. I’ve. Bought from Crutchfield for decades starting with my first car stereo in 1987.

Got the majority of everything needed to install a headunit and speakers in my 2000 4runner. Instructions and premade harnesses made this job 10x easier. The only thing i ran into was having to space the front speaker out, and cut my door cards, but i chose a speaker with a rather large magnet, p165si from rockford fosgate. The trouble of install was worth it because they sound amazing. Crutchfield made the buying process very easy.
Radio looks fine.

Easy to use website, quality electronics,wide variety of price ranges, and last thing,they called me to make sure what I ordered was going to work with my system,but I missed the call and it does perfectly.

I was looking for solution to a problem, Crutchfield had what I needed. Thier price was about the same as all, but the Crutchfield rep was so much better than other sites. Shipping was on point, vary happy with the purchase

Everything is so easy when dealing with Crutchfield. Shipping is super fast and the website is easy to navigate.  I consider them a very trusted site for audio equipment and their pricing is always right there with everyone else’s. If not better in some cases. I highly recommend them!
They sent me all the wrong wiring kits and additional stuff I didn’t need for my truck. It wasn’t even available for my model.

I was looking to replace my stock stereo in my 2007 FJ Cruiser. My main purpose was to have built in navigation. Customer Service, and of course great choices and quality!

I ordered Kicker 3.5 inch speakers for my 2023 Subaru Crosstrek Sport. I will be ordering the matching speakers for the doors to complete the system!
Fast shipping.  All brackets and wiring included.  I love the sustainable packaging idea as well.  👌 Will purchase again.
I thought that everything was expensive but looking at and buying I like the fact that you sended me everything and the product was great I'll do business

Crutchfield always has plenty of selections available for whatever I may be looking for. The product videos offer excellent insight, making decisions on what to purchase easy and assists in ensuring one will be happy with what they buy.
Really helpful courses. The material was well organized and covered a lot of ground. The teachers were helpful and responsive. I highly recommend this program.

This is a great online art school! The instructors are easy to talk to, there are tons of resources, and the lectures are extremely informative. The financial aid department was incredibly kind and knowledgeable. My student advisor was attentive and responded swiftly. I’m glad to have gotten a degree here!

Working with the instructors at Sessions made a great impression on me. They were knowledgeable and timely with responses to clarifying things for me. I felt that I could rely on their years of experience to help a novice advance. I left this quarter with more exposure to topics I had no idea would stimulate my mind and my gut. I especially like video editing (the major reason I took the Digital Media course).

Sessions truly is incredible! I live overseas in Japan and did not once have a problem with meeting deadlines or missing out. The professors are incredibly flexible and willing to work with the students, no matter what their opposite schedule may be like. I enjoyed every minute of my program, and learned so many invaluable lessons.

I recommend Sessions College for anyone with a busy schedule whether it's work, being a parent, or both or anyone who can't afford a traditional art school. Session College is flexible and hones in on the skills needed the real world without extra add-ins that aren't as necessary. In the end I'm going to come out of it with a great portfolio because they help with that too. I'm enjoying my time here so far and learning a ton of useful information to feel confident moving forward.

The classes were just the right pace for someone who works full time. The classes for the software programs provided great introductions to the software as well as allowing you to build up your knowledge. The assignments were not overly complicated and did not deviate from what was taught in the lesson.

The Sessions Online Multimedia Certificate programs was well worth my time. I feel like the instructors were receptive and helpful. The value of the program is truly what you put into it. That being said, the courses and the lessons are well designed. If you are interested in getting your feet wet in some great visual programs like Photoshop, Premiere Pro and After Effects, as well as videography in their Digital Video Production Course, this program will start you down that path.
Sessions College was so great for the flexibility and accessibility it provides.

As a Veteran with PTSD & anxiety issues, it’s hard for me to be in public places sometimes. This was a fantastic alternative to traditional school. I feel like the instructors made it easy for me to learn with written and video instructions. The pace is great, it’s not too fast and we were able to work ahead if we could. Overall great school and fantastic instructors! Looking forward to applying my knowledge that I have now in Video Production.

It was a good program overall. The only recommended improvement I submitted to all my classes was to update the media included for each class. The lectures are all text-based, and tutorial videos are few and far between. When there are videos, they seem to be low quality and dated. The information is still relevant, but to engage with modern learners, presentation matters, and for those who learn better by seeing, including video lectures and how-to videos would be great. Learners can go to Udemy and other platforms to study with practicing artists who post fantastic videos and update content regularly.

I had a great experience in Sessions College. My professors graded assignments quickly and gave thorough and thoughtful feedback on my every submission. I enjoyed the process of learning and following along with the lectures, and the lessons were all geared toward what I needed know for my desired profession. Sessions even expanded my career horizons for what I could use the knowledge that I gained for in the future. Overall, I would highly recommend using Sessions as a way to achieve specialized certification. I haven't gone to Sessions for a degree but I imagine the experience would be just as exceptional.

My experience with the school was very positive. Each class is very easy to navigate, as well as it's resources. All of my previous teachers have been very helpful throughout my 3 1/2 years being here and it was the best decision of my life to go to school here for graphic design. I highly recommend this school for those looking to get into design or photography.

What can I say I learned to much enrolling into session college. When I first started i did know how to use a computer but with hard work and all the teacher’s guidance I can know use adobe programs for art. Well worth the time and effort. I plan to help my husband make videos games and start my own small art business.

I’ve really enjoyed my time at Sessions. The instructors know their stuff and I’ve gotten good feedback.  I’ve learned so much in each class. And while a discussion group will always still be a discussion group, it’s always great seeing other students work and encouraging them and getting feedback on my pieces. I only wish I could do a bachelors degree there.

I learned a tremendous amount at Sessions, taking a Digital Photography Certificate program. Having no previous experience with digital cameras, I'm now able to utilize this with my current art fields. My recommendations would be for curriculum videos to be updated. Several were not only old, but several were non working, and I had to search elsewhere on the web for explanations, and sometimes this proved fruitless. I  would suggest the use of more video's, filling in what lacks from not being live in a classroom setting. Second, most instructors were very quick to reply to questions, but others took weeks. It's very frustrating with slow responses as classes are quick paced. One instructor went almost three weeks without grading any of the class. With no critiques or responses, it affected any growth during that period. Other than those two mentions, Sessions College is very high quality learning.

Sessions College has helped me and the work my company provides look more professional. I have learned so much in the one year here in the Web Design course than I could have imagined. Helpful and friendly instructors that will help you succeed in whatever career course-Degree you are interested in.
Great Support and Objective Feedback

I was impressed with the quality of the education, particularly because it was managed online. The only thing I missed was being inspired to engage more. It wasn't really clear what was possible. Even so, that was minor. I managed to come to a reasonably comfortable place working with the Adobe programs and acquired a basic level of design capacity.

I came to Sessions following an experience at a traditional college, and they blew me away. These programs are top-notch with excellent instructors who are helpful and at the ready for any and all questions. They make it so easy to follow your path in the world of art!

I was very impressed with the patients the instructor had with me. I'm 49 and am self tought on Lightroom and had to unlearn quite a few things. Taz allowed me on several occasions to resubmit my work with some positive feedback and suggestions. I can only get better and improve my craft with that kind of instruction. I am now looking forward to continuing my online education.

Super! Blew the test administrators expectations through the roof! She admitted the she did not think I was capable of doing 6 tests and passing all of them with in the 3 allowed tries, much less pass all 6 on the first try and in under 45 min! Thanks much Driving Tests!

I read the handbook then took a handful of practice tests and passed my permit test in the same day. If you are struggling and your permit test is coming up, I would highly recommend reading the handbook and then using the practice tests to solidify the knowledge. Excellent service, it was worth paying for the premium membership. Straightforward and helpful!
Great set up to get you lined up to your exam. It is all in the details.

I've taken other theory classes and they were 5-30 minute videos with 10 question tests immediately after the video. The entire process took about 4 hours. Your videos are loaded with nonessential information and have a 12 hour video series and 2½ hours of testing. Not useful. 1 out of 10, I would not recommend.

I loved the program and wish I had started it years ago as a hobby.  I like to know stuff so I watch Jeopardy.   The photos help to understand the question.  Like a through fare when I see it I know what they are talking about.  Also, a picture of roundabout counterclockwise and a dynamic and highway interchange sign.  The questions are awesome and help to watch for key words  like never, except, true, false, etc.  It helps to read the  question carefully to avoid missing it.  An approaching light rail vehicle means close and the manual says never turn in front of an approaching light rail vehicle.  The correct answer was you can turn in front of a light rail vehicle with a green light and I understand it now after your review.    I received my CDL today and I would gladly repeat the DMV test now that I have your great information.   Passing the DMV exam is like solving a rubic's cube and you really have to know what answer the DMV is looking for as the best, best possible answer. I feel sorry for people who don't have your information because it blows the cobwebs out of one's head.   I would rather do this at home than have the DMV blow them out with a  failed exam.  I say if you are driving NOW you need to know the law now not a year from now when you take the DMV test.   I notice yellow lines, white lines, etc. on the news now when I never noticed them before.
The online tests enabled me to pass quickly with only four wrong answers.
Tests were precise and on point. Training was well written and easy to follow. Passed all endorsements on the first attempt.
Over many years, I have "taken" hundreds of continuing education courses in my profession,
I can’t complain, the questions that you guys provided over prepared me for my permit test. 🤣❤️

I've used Driving-Tests a couple times now when studying for CDL GK written test and also for getting endorsements. Bottom line it's the best product I've seen, through and through. And I've sampled an array of different study guides, practice tests, cliffnotes and different apps to get prepared for CDL written testing at the DMV. None come close. Driving-Tests is just so comprehensive. The have videos, ELDT, tons of practice questions, summaries, AI chat in case you get stuck on a topic or question, challenge bank feature to hone in on questions you got wrong, the algorithm explains why your answer was right/wrong, and perhaps best of all, their customer service team is absolutely a pleasure to work with. Just drop them an email and they'll be back at you in minutes. If only the DMV staff were this helpful, attentive, and competent. I have had nothing but success using Driving-Tests to prepare for written testing at the DMV. It's so simple. Read the CDL manual for your state. Take the Driving-Tests practice tests. Watch their ELDT training. Feel of confidence as you crush the written test. It's not cheap, but it's worth every penny.

Soma is so beyond helpful and understanding not only has she been super flexible with my difficult school schedule I’ve had but she has been giving me nothing but support, love and all around inspirational teacher to me. Very informative and helpful class into the entertainment industry. Honestly, the fact that Soma herself is giving the classes and interacting makes this workshop that much more real and worthwhile! Actor Academy is the best all in one package for actors to go from getting started all the way to landing their first role. Soma is highly interactive with all students and the classes are well structured. 10/10 would highly recommend!

Actor Academy is everything an actor looking to kickstart their career could ask for. Soma and the other acting coaches including Emily, Christina and Hershel not only work with us weekly during our classtime, but support and interact with us within the discord community. The online course covers all of the basics and necessities, and Soma is always adding new chapters/videos based on what we (the students) want to learn/improve on. The many resources available to us help us hone in on out craft and grow as performers. Actor Academy cultivates a community of actors from all around the world and sets us up for success when preparing for and filming auditions.

Actor Academy has validated all the concerns and answered all the questions I have about the industry. It provides you with a community of people pursuing their passion just as hard as you. A couple things were frustrating, my jack plate was shipped out with missing parts, no installation instructions, and the shipped email notification was misleading. The email states " (#8290) was shipped via UPS, UPS® Ground on 9/12/2023". The only thing that occurred on that day was a shipping label was created and and for some reason it wasn't actually picked up until "SEPTEMBER 13 - 3:56 PM". Additionally the product was sold as an 5" setback, but doesn't give any indication that by selecting a 2 or 3 inch clamping board thickness this increases the setback. Pucks or a different option would be much better suited vs adding more heavy starboard and additional setback unless a customer needed that.

Had my suspension and sway bar installed which was noisy and clunking and still has been. Products were shipped promptly. It was a direct ship from Integrated engineering.  Integrated shipped the wrong part but xlr8 was right on it. Knowledgeable people, helpful have excellent products.  Have not installed the part as yet, winter or raining. Just installed the product. Honestly they have pretty fast processing times for orders. I was expecting to wait 2-3 business days for them to process my orders like other companies but it only took a day and it was shipped out!

I purchased a set of Scorpion resonated down pipes for my B8.5 Audi S4. I couldn’t be happier with my buying experience. From the quick response to a question about availability. I will definitely be recommending Scorpion and XLR8 Performance to my fellow enthusiast.

I ordered a fully cat back from scorpion. Packed came quick (3 days or so) but was damaged…dents all over the muffler and resonators. One pipe was completely smashed inwards. Very poor quality. Also, the exhaust flanges that meet up to the headers were 90° off and didn’t even line up correctly. The pipes were about 3 inches short from the header connection. So I am going to have to cut and weld on the correct way

Amazing service and prompt shipping and delivery! I ordered a new exhaust system for my Mini Cooper S. I had some questions and called up to speak with a rep. I never felt rushed or pressured. I then placed the order online and it shipped out right away and delivered the next day!

This place has that old school dedication to customer service that you don’t find any longer. I worked with Craig (and I think one other person Bruce?) Both excellent.  Craig went above and beyond for me, even unasked.

I’ve had this kit for my 2016 dodge challenger scatpack since November. I’ve waited quite some time to do a review so that I can give a little more insight from my experience. I have put a little over approximately 5,000 miles on my car since the install (my car currently has a little over 219K miles), and I feel since I’ve switched to the kit it’s been a little more responsive than before (and loving the gas prices). The only “downside” would be that gas stations are obviously not as common, but since I can still put regular gas in a pinch (haven’t needed to yet) it’s not a big deal for me personally.

I purchased my first eFlexFuel kit for my 2002 Pontiac Trans Am WS6.  The kit is a quality product and I am totally satisfied. I purchased this kit instead of other flex fuel options because I like the idea of having a "computer" which is solely controlling the fuel while the factory ECU does not have to be modded.  My  mechanic installed it and advised me the installation was not difficult at all.  Great product.

This company is the best company to work with they’re always there for any question you have especially DARYLL I Believe that’s his name. I have the eflexplus kit very noticeable hp and tq gain I would recommend this kit to any one who wants to go e85 very easy and quick install and you can go straight to pumping e85 best investment I’ve done!
Installed on my 23’ Charger Jailbreak. Easy installation, minimal effort, great results.. also, eFlex app is friendly and easy to use. Pump 93 daily, blend e85 on race nights.. #getflexed

One of the best advantages of using the E85 eflexfuel conversion kit is the impact on performance. Upon installation, I immediately noticed a significant increase in horsepower and torque. The engine runs smoother and responds a lot faster to throttle inputs. It definitely, without a doubt enhances performance. So far I have not encountered any issues such as a check engine light. The installation itself was pretty straightforward, thanks to eflexfuel for providing knowledgeable instructions. It is a worthwhile investment for enthusiasts that are looking to maximize the potential of their vehicles. I would 100% recommend purchasing a conversion kit from this company!
At first I didn’t think it would work but now that I have it on my car it runs good and smooth and I have no complains about the kit everything works fine

Kit plugged right into my 2008 c6 corvette. Been using it about a month and it’s absolutely great. Been running straight e85 without a problem. Injector duty cycle does get real high in the performance style mode so an larger injector upgrade will be somewhere in the future.

Sent the wrong quick disconnect for the fuel line by the firewall. I was sent all 3/8th quick connects not a single 5/16th making the install more of a hassle and more time consuming. When I contacted about it they said they thought only the hellcats had that. No additional quick connect sent and they asked how my cars running. Well it’s running with the stock fuel rubber hose that connects to the fuel rail and shouldn’t be. I should be using the full hose you sent with the right quick connects.
First installation, first start without issues!!

I fell in love with the technology of running E85 years ago and finally took the leap of faith! I am so happy of my purchase of the eFlexFuel PRO kit!  Majority of the public had easy installs and great customer service experience.  Not so much for me.

Great Instructions that are through and specific. You will defiantly need some mechanical knowledge to install this kit but otherwise it was super simple and straight forward to install on my 2004 CRV. Everything works as intended and as of now has ben going strong for 2 months would highly recommend this kit for anyone interested in running E85 on older vehicles. This kit is also clearly well made and quality was not lacking on any respects.

Absolutely love their products my car runs great with it I’ve  had no product issues just some user errors and the kit told me exactly what’s wrong it’s easy to install now I get cheaper gas with more ponies

Installed the eflexfuel kit for my 2006 Lexus GX470 a couple weeks ago. Once you figure out the injector polarity this thing is plug and play. So far its working flawlessly. I had check engine light come twice (user error) once because I forgot to connect an evap valve and the other because I forgot to put the gas cap on ( distracted myself putting e85). Now the Check engine light is off. I also washed the engine bay and had no issues ! E10 was 16.7 mpg vs E85 was 11.9 mpg. The price was 4.99 for e10 and 2.99 for e85. Ultimately my price per mile was 33 cents on e10 and 25 cent using e85. That’s 7 cents savings per mile saving $350 for every 5000 miles / every oil change.

We bought this kit (eflexplus) for our 2013 Camaro SS with the LS3 engine. Overall the quality of the product is great and install itself was a breeze. In total the install took us a little over an hour. We ran across no issues except a lot of the directions were hard to understand so we used the CrisFix video where he installed an eflexfuel kit on his Prius and it really helped us understand what to do and make us feel confident in the install. Everything was plug n play and the app basically sets itself up when you start the car after installing the kit. The different drive modes and features available on the app are awesome and really keeps you in the know on what the fueling system is doing. 10/10 would recommend to anyone who wants an e85 kit for their vehicle!
Great product and was at my door in 2 days from Finland! Installed immediately and love being able to run e85 @$3 gallon...plus performance benefits to boot.
If you have a high performance car, just don't.

Easy install on my Mercedes ML350, but ran into a issue towards the end. Yesvin came to the rescue, guided me through videochat and showed me what to do. Made a rookie mistake and connected the wires wrong. He checked in to make sure if I needed help, and now I am running e85 and paying half what I normally pay for gas.
I had to return my nav card and their customer service was outstanding.

Purchased for my MX-30, and was skeptical since it was so much cheaper than the Mazda dealership. Was pleasantly surprised that it worked perfectly with no issues.
your shipping is terrible or should i say usps is terrible change your shipping method but so for so good with the sd card

This time and after much researching of "discounted" SYNC 1" Nav cards  being offered by online vendors, I decided to take a chance and order the current "A14" For SYNC 1 systems version from  MazNavStore. So, I took a chance and placed my order.
The plastic box was empty.
Very knowledgeable with their products and provided me with the correct part that I needed for the project.
While ordering and delivery was great and installation was also easy just a little disappointing that our home address still does not come up on map.

As a return customer, I am very happy with my purchase and even got one for my son-in-law for his vehicle.  For the price, you can’t beat it.  I’ve had no issues, and was very pleased with their customer service when I did have a question.  Would definitely recommend especially compared to what the dealerships charge.

The entire process was easy.  I submitted my new car VIN and within a day found out they had the navigation card I needed.  I ordered the card on line and within days it was delivered in the mail.  The installation instructions were easy and the navigation map appeared right away.  The entire experience was great and saved me a lot of money.
Effortless ordering. Matching service worked good. SD card synced up with car without issues.

When I purchased my 2021 Mazda CX 9, the Nav Card never did work properly. The dealership blew me off about it, BUT they'd sell me a new one for several hundred dollars! No thanks!! Finally, my patience wore out after two years of dealing with the wonky Nav Card, even though I had updated it via my desktop; I ordered a new one through the MazNavStore, at a fraction of the price that the dealership wanted. And it's absolutely PERFECT! Thanks to Sam at MazNavStore, any questions or concerns I had, he was always helpful and patient with me. Sincerely, Sharon

My experience with the company was very positive even though it turns out my SD didn't work and no SD was available for my 2024 Mazda CX -5. After initially determining the 1st SD didn't work I returned it free of charge for a 2nd one. The 2nd SD didn't work either. The company explained they found on further investigation that the SD was not usable in my car and they didn't have one that did. They immediately refunded my money.

Plugged in the card, started the car and navigation worked with no further interactions needed other than setting options. Only drawback was the use of DHL as the initial delivery service. They then transfer it to USPS.  Updates on delivery status were poor as the package appeared to be stuck in the system for days before arriving.

Everything you promised, you delivered.  The new chip arrived as promised and replacing the old with the new was as easy as the ordering process.  It was hilarious seeing how easy all of this was especially when Toyota makes it sound so difficult and dangerous.

I bought the cattle tracker tag. The product itself is okay requires a lot of full sun exposure to keep working. In the winter we don't get much sun and in these summer cattle are in the shade a lot. But the actual GPS part of it works great. And the company is absolutely wonderful to work with!! Super helpful and accommodating.

Hardware works well.  Software works well but the interface could be tweaked better.  App, also works well but is a little clunky.  The product description lied about cost of service.  It indicates 12.49 per month paid yearly (about 150 per year) but it cost me $200 for one year, paid upfront. Other than the deceptive advertising, it is a good product.
A solution to a multiple problems!

What a fantastic company! If I could give you 10 stars I would!   Excellent service, prompt and reliable responses (thank you, Zak!) to any questions or concerns that may come up.  Love their GPS tracking unit monitoring and service as it provides me with outstanding peace of mind for keeping track of my vehicle(s) especially while I travel.  Super satisfied customer here! Very highly recommended.

The variety of LoneStar Tracking devices available mean customers can chose GPS tracking devices that fit their needs. The app and web-based applications have options useful for fleet operations or personal use to track vehicles, trailers and other assets. The prices for the trackers and the service are competitive and give the owner peace of mind.

I have the hard wired unit in my trailer. I have it setting up in the skylight. The GPS is so sensitive that when I am getting in and out of the trailer with Tooling, it will alert me that there is movement. As soon as I’m traveling, it will alert me that it is traveling. This is great information as this is a work unit that sits on job sites continually. I can monitor this and have peace of mind after hours.

I have been using Lone Star Tracking for about 4 years now on 3 different vehicles. I currently use 2 trackers and I have to say they are the best at what they do. Especially if you talk to Ryan who is relentless in solving any issues with tailoring the trackers to your specific needs. Most companies want to sell their products. This company backs up their products with outstanding customer service. I assure you if you buy from them you have a excellent team to set you up to protect your valuable assets 24/7 !
The customer service is awesome and extremely helpful!

From my initial step of speaking to a representative “in Texas” about the product, to ordering the system was flawless. Installation was easy and setting up the Geo Fence was a snap. I can monitor my trailer at anytime via my cellphone or tablet
The device works good. I have not been able to figure out how to set alerts to notify me when my asset is moving when I am not the one moving it could use some help

My LoneStar trackers did exactly what I expected them to do which ultimately for me was to be able to track my vehicles in a given case they were stolen. I had an incident where one of my dump trucks was at the mechanic shop and got stolen from there, fortunately for me I had the scorpion tracker on it and was able to track it. I gave the police the coordinates and they were able to retrieve my truck. We actually found it in someone's backyard where they had multiple stolen vehicles where it seem like they were selling them by parts.

The hard wired unit is awesome to stash somewhere, my biggest fear is mice chewing wires not being discovered ever.  It has worked flawlessly since installation. Customer service was there when questions came. Only critic would be foreknowledge of when one satellite hands over to another satellite it can trigger a notification like the unit has moved.

Hasn’t been a month yet but I absolutely love it!! As soon as my jetski moves, starts or stops, I get a notification of its precise location via Email, Text & App. Yes it’s a lot of notifications but I don’t mind it because its well worth it, especially if I were to be asleep, it will definitely make me check my phone.

Overall, the app works well.  At some update point it lost the ability to give location details on the map.  Business names no longer come up.  I called support and they put in a bug report,  but it’s yet to be fixed almost a year later.

We have been extremely pleased with the Yabby collar from Lonestar Tracking. They were great at answering all my questions before the purchase and customer service was wonderful in quickly resolving a programing error when the collar arrived. It has worked flawlessly ever since. The unit is small but tough. The app does everything I could want. Battery life is unmatched in any other collar option I have found. Only suggestion would be an option to change the time from Central to Pacific and an optional real-time locator on demand.

The device is good quality, but it has trouble with Geofence accuracy in our four acre pasture.  It will often say the dog is in the neighbor's yard when she is not, or sometimes that she is in the neighbor's pasture two doors down.  So far, we don't think she's has left our pasture.  We are still happy that we can monitor her and the the collar cost and battery life are excellent.

I highly recommend this Company for Livestock Guardian Dog tracking. I can see where these dogs are at all times. We recently lost one of our big male dogs to a pack of Coyotes and with his collar, we were able to locate his body. Snow, Rain, and heat don't seem to bother the performance of these devices. ADKOS is like having a personal concierge with you every step if the way!  Used them after retiring 2 years ago...  2 weeks ago my vehicle broke down 600 miles between home and vacation. We traded in out Class B RV for a travel trailer despite my anxiousness about pulling a trailer. I didn't know which hitch to get, so I watched a Youtube video review of 11 trailer hitches and ProPride was rated the best.  After watching your video and several installation videos, I became convinced it was the best choice.  I had no idea there was so much to learn.  Working with Brent through the selection/buying process was a pleasure.  He is a true professional.  I received the hitch and installed it myself (I'm 70 years old and somewhat handy}.  It was not difficult, but a couple of modifications did have to be made.  We are making our inaugural trip soon and have high expectations.
Staff was very helpful with questions, very knowledgeable.   They even advised of a discount that I was not aware of.  My request for delayed shipping was handled without a "hitch".

In short, Holy Cow is this thing awesome!  I received a product that was well packaged, obviously manufactured with high quality standards, and very thorough printed and video instructions.  From the initial opening of the package to the first hitch-up, I was impressed.  For the first tow, I purposely waited for a windy gusty day and that day was yesterday in Boise.  First drive did not disappoint.  Truck and trailer handled as a single unit going down the highway despite all the wind gusts.  I still need to head to the scales to dial in the weight distribution, but so far this thing has alleviated my previous anxiety while towing.  '08 F250 loaded to near-payload capacity & Ibex 20BHS.

Fantastic company to deal with. Product not only lives up to all the hype but the customer service and attitude from Pro Pride is absolutely amazing. They will help make your towing experience a winner in any way they can. While it's expensive, it's worth every penny to have peace of mind while towing. Can't say enough good things about them and their product. Been the other route with a few of their competition and this product truly delivers what they say it will. Buy it and relax and enjoy the experience.
I don't want to risk injury or loss by towing without the very best option for ELIMINATING trailer sway.

After a season of using a top-of-the-line weight distribution hitch to pull our 33' travel trailer for several camping trips, I was left looking for more stable and relaxed towing experience.  This is exactly what I got with the ProPride 3P.  The traditional WDH mitigated sway, but the trailer would still try to point the truck in different directions based on wind and passing vehicles. This is a significant issue when driving on Texas highways with speed limits of 75 mph and you can only tow at 60 mph or less due to the lack of stability.
Finally no white knuckle driving,  no worrying when a big rig passes or wind blows.   What a huge relief.

We have over 3,000 miles on our P3 now, and we love it.  We really didn't have any issues with our Weigh Safe Hitch, but the main reason I wanted the P3 was how easy/fast it is to connect and disconnect from our truck.  This feature isn't discussed often, so I wanted to get the word out there.

The hitch arrived in perfect condition due to the great packing job from ProPride.  Installation instructions were easily followed and complete.  I've towed campers for 9 years using a wdh with chains.  The difference ProPride 3P made in my first trip was unbelievable.  Greater turning radius, no noise when traveling or backing up, and when 18 wheelers passed me on the interstate there was no "pull" that I experienced previously.  There is a learning curve for hitching and unhitching, but one I will enjoy mastering.  I'm certainly glad I invested in this hitch!
Customer service is outstanding. Was even able to get Brent on the phone during install. Can't say enough good things about the hitch and the company !

Absolute pleasure ordering and working with ProPride. Both Brent and Sean answered all my questions and some of them were really direct and pointed questions about cost, weight, value, etc. In the end, I purchased the 3P hitch from them because I could tell they cared deeply about their customers and products. I only wish every business took this much pride and care. I guess it's in the name. Oh, the hitch is amazing too but you probably already know that.

I've had the hitch for 5 years now. I have no other connection to or interest in ProPride. The hitch is simply the best one out there for sway control and weight distribution for larger, heavier trailers. The customer support was superb 5 years ago when I was installing the hitch and got a callback from Sean on a Sunday afternoon, resolving an installation issue I was having.
Excellent packaging, excellent fit and finish. Quality everywhere I look. Instructions were good, all parts accounted for prior to our installation. Worth the money!

Good after-order followup to be sure everything was going as planned. Terrific technical information/videos on some accessory equipment and reasons why they might be useful with the hitch. Helped to avoid having to order later and wait on parts.
Had to customize a lot of brackets to fit my trailer. Hitch seems to work ok, but haven’t had a lot of miles yet.
Simple, functional, and designed as part of the hitch.
Customer service was a10, owned up to a mistake and fixed it right away.

Installed my pro pride p3 hitch today and it was great to pull my 40 foot camper and feel relaxed. The install was easy and the results were awesome thank y’all so much for the peace of mind I now have towing my brand new camper. If anyone thinks the price is too much get one and feel the relief you have in it being there again thank y’all Eddie McAteer

First time dealing with MurCal. These people are consummate professionals from beginning to end! fast and efficient ordering, followup and shipping! i look forward to dealing with them often in the future. Thanks MurCal. Garry West D.M.I.

Unit arrived in perfect condition with great instructions.  Could not have been easier to install.  Thanks to everyone at Ingrams!  Buy the heat strip and install it when you buy the main unit (even if you don't think you will need it).  Cheap insurance it will minimize the need for additional trips to a cold, cramped attic!

Paul was extremely helpful with everything I needed. He was also able to connect me with another individual to assist with connecting the ECOBEE thermostat. I only wish Mr. Cool could provide the same level of excellent support.

To be straight forward with you, I'm disappointed that the unit I received turned out not to be a DIY Mr Cool unit. I was under the mistaken impression that the one I ordered was a DIY unit but it's not. I thought Mr Cool was DIY. As I looked at Utube at installations videos on several different channels it's painfully obvious that mine is not a DIY unit. Paper template is missing, the the 3.54 inch hole drill piece is missing. The guide for the tubing through the wall is missing. The wrap for the tubing isn't there. Instead of just connecting the lines and opening them. I have to hire a HVAC guy to vacuum the lines and probably put in refrigerant. Also the instructions manual must be for a professional installer. I would recommend that you inform purchasers that certain units of Mr Cool are not DIY and are not appropriate for non-professionals.

We really like these units. I've self-installed two of them. I installed a 12,000 BTU wall unit in my office and an 18,000 BTU floor unit in our master bedroom. In the past 5 years I have spent over $8,000 on two different Senville mini-split units. When the first went out I even upgraded to a 24,000 btu but it was just as bad. I'm converting from central heat and air to complete Senville heat pump minisplits. I like that I could buy a la cart with Senville. My $600-$800 a month energy bill is down to maybe $300. With the rest of the units in I should see it drop again. The next project is remodeling where the central H&A left big space to remodel the master bathroom.

My 4th unit in three years. I am so pleased. Good quality, good price, fast shipping. The best part is the operating cost,it's about 60 bucks a month for winter heating,and 85 to 105 for summer cooling. I live in Southern Arizona where I initially had swamp coolers, but our humid Seasons from July to the end of September are murderous because coolers can't evaporate and cool you down, which causes you to run them 24/7 thus wasting so much energy. I set these on 76 during the day 78 during the night and they cycle on and off and have lowered my energy bill considerably. Thank you Senville excellent product.😎
The customer services and the quick turn around on a repair part was superior. Great job from every department.

My boost pump went on the fritz after about 15 months, I ordered another one off their website, but also asked mike if it was under warranty.  He said yes, and credited my card the full amount of the order, GREAT WORK, seawater pro, I am glad I chose you as my water maker.

After several conversations with Mike at Seapro I pulled the trigger on the 40/gal per hour AC system. I installed it myself and of course had a few questions along the way. I installed it so know how to troubleshoot and maintain it and spending $5k vs the $20k (without install) I was considering is a huge discount for the same end result.

Customer service is just outstanding.  I mean, above and beyond. Seawater Pro does a good job of navigating the cost/benefit discussion on water makers.  Are there cheaper ways to build a water maker?  Sure.  But there are some places that you just don't want to cut corners to save a buck or two. In our case, we did additional upgrades on our own.  But all in all, a great solution.  And again, fantastic support.
Customer services leaves much to be desired.  I’ve called twice, both times I received a very short response.  Today I texted with a question and this is the response I received verbatim:

We have to open all the packages yet before we install in 7 to 10 days.  The owner Mike was great in answering our questions and answering the call on first ring.  I would suggest for $20 to include the rAw water filter and save the hassle of ordering separately.  If everything goes smoothly we will pass along the good word which is how we learned about your product.

I just bought two 40gph water makers for my new to me 58’ LRC Hatteras. Last good point..Mike is a customer service pro…if you have any problems, issues, or questions he will answer them in person over the phone…brilliant!

Wally explained everything but then he sent the install manual, which was a big help. It has all the specs and dimensions that made ordering with the knowledge that it would actually fit. Water maker arrived in 5 days!!!

I would have given a lower rating but the service was absolutely outstanding. I had a couple of early problems with the portable unit I purchased and Mike took care of them right away. The unit is working very well and I’m now happily cruising the Bahamas and not worried about where to get water.

After much consideration I chose seawater pro 20gph ac system. It’s an uncomplicated well designed watermaker that has been a game changer for our cruising life. Customer service was responsive and helpful when needed. Can’t ask for better!

I purchased a 35 GPH 230V 50HZ unit  in 2019. We have one problem in 2020 with the cylinder of the membrane cracking at the seal joint. This was replaced IMMEDIATELY by Mike and it was super easy to dismantle and reassemble. The unit has made tons of water since purchase and we could not have been happier. The costs of the unit, of the replacement filters IS not even comparable with other brands. The functionality is great. No fancy electronic remote controls that will drive everybody crazy. Just simple and effective hydraulic and mechanics simple to use and very effective. If I could redo this again, I would buy their DC models, in order to avoid running the generator to make water.  I WILL RECOMMEND THIS BRAND to anyone who intends to install a water maker on a sailboat and does not want to deal with problems!!!!
