Pool Supplies had the correct solar cover I needed.  Once ordered it arrived in a timely manner.  I will be ordering from Pool Suppliers Superstore in the future for my above ground pool.

I ordered a pool pump twice. The first time, i forgot to separate billing and shipping address and it said transaction failed. I caught my mistake and modified the information and the transaction went through. I received an email the next day saying the order was cancelled. I responded to Customer service saying that this item was being bought as a gift and asked to reinstate the order and they told me no. I would have to re-order it. So I did being meticulous about the details to prevent this error again. Unfortunately, they again cancelled my order. I sent them email it was obvious they didn't want my business and that I would be ordering from somewhere else. And I did.

I purchased Hayward W3S180T92S ProSeries 18 In., 1 HP Sand Filter System for Above-Ground Pools thru Superstore via Amazon. I have it installed by a professional. The pump portion leaked yet the Superstore refuses to replace it w/o my returning the product. For anyone who knows pools, I can not just remove it w/o all of pool water draining. All they have to do is send me a new Hayward pump, I will replace the old one and return it immediately. Very poor customer service. I will not be buying any products from them ever again. I contacted Hayward and they told me they will handle the problem. I tried to contact Amazon which is nearly impossible.
It was easy to order the part that I needed for my filter.  It had a competitive price and arrived promptly, which was good because I couldn't run my pool pump with the old leaking part.
Great website. Good pricing, fast free delivery. Good selection and sale pricing to boot. What's not to like?

Will never use this place again. $250 order of 3” chlorine tablets ordered 8/11, paid for via PP but never received. Fedex tracking shows label created. 2 emails to pool supplies superstore asking status and later asking for refund were never responded to. So im out $250 and have no pool chlorine. (Instead, ordered from InTheSwim and got chlorine in 2 days.)

The product in question,  is a SOLAR COVER, which was marketed as a high-quality item with a guaranteed lifespan of three years. However, shortly after just one year of use, it began to disintegrate, releasing microplastic particles that are harmful to the environment. This leads us to suspect that the company is aware of the product's inherent defects and that the stated guarantee policy of three years is misleading and disingenuous.

My order was being delivered through FedEx. There was a problem I let superstore know about it. They took care of the problem in the very fast manner. I would totally recommend this company to everyone.
Ordering was simple - first impression is the machine works pretty good although it would not climb the walls in my pool.

I have had nothing but trouble with this unit since day one, customer service is hard to get in touch with and when you finally talk to them they are not helpful at all i am completely dissatisfied. I would recommend not purchasing this product, spend a little more money and get the good stuff.
Ordered the Pilot H2 and didn’t work from the time I opened the box.
The filter door doesnt shut very easy and it could do a better job of cleaning the dust from the floor and the stairs it doesnt touch at all
Aiper communicated well through unexpected delays.

The pool cleaner came without its filter but Crystal from support was brilliant and got this arranged as soon as possible over the busy new year period. I have used the product 3 times and for the discounted price-point I am happy with its performance. Crystal went above and beyond - thanks!

I paid for the goods in Spain.  The payment was immediately deducted from my account.  An order number has been generated.  Today, after 4 days, there is still no shipping number in the system.  Communication is very slow and always the same answer.  "We will send soon" .  In several emails, I asked from which warehouse (from which country) the shipment to Spain would go.  They avoid answering.  Very bad service!!!
Easy to put together and simple to operated but it doesn’t pick up the big leaf at the bottom of the pool.

I encountered a problem with the original pool cleaner and called customer service. They led me through some potential problem solving steps which located the problem which wasn't an easy fix so they sent a new replacement . New one works great on the first day of use. Thanks

I ordered the Aiper Seagull PRO in Dec 2023. After multiple attempts to understand what happened to my order, I finally received the robot almost 4 weeks later. The box arrived in Spain without damage. I tested the robot. It was definitely not performing as expected. I contacted support and advised to send the robot back for a refund or exchange. I had high hopes for this machine so went ahead for an exchange. The second box arrived faster this time. However, Aiper sent me the Seagull PRO LITE instead of the Seagull PRO - Like I wouldn´t notice I was sent the cheaper version. I raised the concern. Aiper support tried to justify that this was a better version, expect that it is not and is also cheaper than what I paid. I don´t appreciate being tricked. Result = Returned goods and 1 star review for trying to load on me a cheaper version

Unfortunately I had to return the model I purchased because it only worked with flat bottom pools and mine has a slope. Customer service made the return so easy, quick and no headaches. The refund was within 3 days. Alot of companies out there could learn from them on how customer service should be like.
this device only worked once and stopped working, charged all the way (green light) but the power button doesn't do anything.

As I have stated, your customer service is A+. However, the follow on ads on-line are driving me mad. They follow me around like a ghost that I can't get rid of. I don't get it? I have already purchased your product so why keep bombarding me with the non-stop ads?

I have a very odd shaped pool so the cleaner was having difficulty cleaning the entire thing.  What it was able to do it did fairly well but I did have to help it off my main drains several times.  I emailed customer service and they were super easy to deal with.  They responded by the next day, sent me a return label and then credited me my purchase price within two days of me dropping it off at my FexEx carrier.  Thank you for being so understanding and easy to work with!

the product so far does what it's supposed to do. I have questions I hope you can respond to.  We have a kidney shaped pool and going up the sides is curved.  Will I be alright using side cleaning even though it is not a rectangular pool .  There are also granular step and seats inside the kidney shaped pool.  Would I be safer just using cleaning floor option.  It goes about a foot up the curved side and comes back on floor only cleaning.  Should I try side cleaning also?  is there any danger to the Aiper vacuum?

Aiper dolphin pro, for our in ground pool, which is 25‘ x 30‘ 4 foot to 6 foot on a full charge it will do the entire bottom of the pool and I cannot believe how it would actually climb the walls up to the tile. It takes about 2 1/2 hours to knock out the pool cleaning, but it does everything. It says it does very simple to use every penny to keep me from having to vacuum and scrub every other day.
My Aiper Seagull Pro Lite works great, I am a bit concern about the mesh in the debris basket, seems a bit flimsy,other than that everything else is definitely positive.
Customer service took care of my problem and gave me the discount i was trying to enter on line.. u will continue using this cleaner on all my pools... Customers love em !
I know Aiper will probably have a new model for the next swim season, but getting such a great discount on the top of line robotic pool cleaner was amazing.

I purchased an Aiper Pro Lite which proved to be defective. I contacted Aiper Customer Service and was instructed to send the defective unit back for replacement. The new unit arrived within a few days and it has performed well. I thank Aiper for quickly responding and replacing the defective unit.
Great customer service in resolving any issues. We had an issue with our Ariel that was under warranty and they sent out a replacement.
Very fast shipping. Item was brand new.

Arial is the 4th version of the solar skimmer. We purchased the first in 2018. My husband is obsessive about keeping the surface of our 38 year old pool clean, so this device has saved him countless hours he used to spend getting errant debris off the surface.  My only request would be more options, especially in the mid-west, for getting models diagnosed and repaired. The last one cost us $600 and lasted 3 seasons. Is $200 per season worth it?  Probably, but I also hate the idea of the old one going to landfill when it might have been salvageable.
The product stopped working after less than a week.

I recently purchased the solar powered leaf skimmer. It is very easy to use and the customer service department is great. I had a delivery problem when I made them aware it was corrected with the delivery service immediately. My pool is covered with multiple trees and shaded so I will need to figure out my timing to allow the skimmer to fully charge. I am excited about the skimmer and know it will really help me as my leaves start to fall.

My order took entirely too long to arrive.  It was ordered 12/19/23 and i received it 1/12/2024.  Then I discovered that the wrong parts were sent to me.  So I waited again for the right parts to come and finally received them on 1/24/2024.

I am a 1st Generation Solar Breeze Customer.   I bought the very 1st Solar Robotic pool skimmer when it came out years ago.   I have been having them repaired and upgraded since.   Ariel will probably be my last one, when I retire in 2030, my pool will be made into a miniature golf putting green.  They are great for  people who have pools and enjoy them.  I would highly recommend Solar Breeze Robotic Pool Skimmer to anyone with a pool, it does the job.

Ariel does an amazing job with the debris from our palm trees and the neighboring cottonwoods just across our wall from the pool. It even takes the brunt of our frequent summer monsoon storms, making the Aquabott's job much easier. The Ariel is replacing a several years old Solar Breeze and is a leap forward in robotic technology.  We are especially thankful for the collision avoidance system which protects the lip of our pool much better than the Solar Breeze.  Same great cleaning in a more pool friendly package!

I bought an Ariel in August 2022, it stopped working in June 23, within the 12 month warranty, they agreed to send a replacement, said they would send the tracking number. Since then I have heard nothing, no replies to emails except the automated one. I am wondering if they are still in  business. Very disappointed, our previous one lasted several years. Well my review produced a response, apology that my claim was misfiled & new one arrived today 10 Aug 23.

Shipping time/process and customer service for purchase was great. However, 3 rating due to design choice of Ariel bs prior NX2. Concerned that use of sensors on Ariel model will get scratched eventually by pool side coping and unit will not be long lasting as a result.  We will see but thought NX2 spinning front wheels without reliance on sensor feature made more sense—just needed to improve front wheel gears design durability of NX2.  But maybe Ariel new design is intended to establish new purchases shortly after 1-yr limited warranty expires and if unit does not last as long as NX2 did.

I'm very happy with the level of professionalism with the customer service team. I've only had Arial for about 2 weeks now she's a workhorse, I noticed when her charge gets low she starts acting a little goofy ( going in circles and takes a time out until fully charged.

Quick response to questions. Provided me a solution to an out of warranty product that was very acceptable.  I've ALWAYS had great customer support from Solar Breeze. I will continue to buy their innovative, work saving product.
Excellent product and fast service and reply. We just purchased our third pool robot, Ariel and could not be happier.  She does an incredible job at keeping our pool clean.

I love the Ariel.  It doesn't seem to do as good a job as my old solar breeze.  I run both of them at the same time and the old solar breeze seems to pick up more surface debris.  The solar breeze also holds chlorine tablets, the Ariel doesn't.  That being said, I still love the Ariel and it does a better job of curving away from the side of the pool instead of hitting the side head on.

This is our second product from Solar-Breeze.  i have had our old original solar-breeze unit sent in & serviced twice.  This year the old one was very sluggish and not hitting all the surface spots.  I ordered a brand new Ariel surface robot.  It is doing a wonderful job of taking all the bugs & leaves off the surface.  Thank you very much for the quick delivery service.  We are again enjoying swimming.

Looks great, but very inferior to the original solar breeze NX2 in terms of performance. I still have my original NX2 and it does 2-3 times the results. Might just be because the battery just lasts longer with the same amount of sun. The NX2 likely has more quality/reliability issues, but when it works, it works much better. Plus I love the chlorine tablet trays. I will not be getting another Arial and will just fixing my old one for as long as I can.

Submitted 2 tickets with 6 follow-up emails over 15 days to their online inquiry/customer service email without a single response, after buying a $500 robot and a 12-mth warranty that broke in 3 mths.  Terrible service and product, pivoting to the BBB and an attorney to handle from here.  Buyer beware
Very fast delivery.  Solar breeze/Ariel has improved greatly since I bought when they first came out.  It is a lovely little efficient mechanism, but I’m only on day 2 of use!

The products they sell are a very good idea, but the only big problem I see is that they make it very expensive and very low quality, the products don't last more than 3 to 4 months and then breaks down. I wish they made a better quality so it could last a couple of years before it breaks on you because I don't have no $$ to throw away.
The Fed Ex shipment went to someone else and then the product was returned to the shipper.  When I contacted Solar-Breeze they responded right away and told me the packing label was unreadable.
Fool me once …
Doheny's customer support reached out to me after i had spent money returning a Pump, back to them and refunded me my money. Thank you!

The pump and filter was shipped quickly.  It arrived 3 days after ordering.  Written instructions/manuals were pretty worthless - needs more pictures or diagrams.  Telephone help was readily available but often couldn’t relate to the reason for the call.  If you could reference a diagram in the manual with the question being posed to the telephone staff it would go much more smoothly.  Solution….write a better manual with diagrams.

I had a disappointing experience with the customer service at this company. The lack of technical support for their products resulted in a long wait for a replacement pump, causing additional costs and inconvenience for me. Despite these challenges, I'm hopeful that the replacement pump will work well when it arrives. Overall, the company has limitations but is doing its best given the circumstances.

I needed a new Hayward pool pump as soon as possible. Contacted several local pool suppliers, nobody had one in stock and was looking at 4-5 days before they could get one to me. No local or any online company could match the price or quick delivery that Doheny's provided. Ordered the pump Thu at 230pm and received it Sat 930am Fedex.
Joanna went above and beyond helping me place this order.

First time purchasing from Doheny’s and I was truly impressed for a number of reasons. I purchased a Hayward pool pump. 1) their pricing was better than almost everyone else and 2) I received the item in 2 days. Above this though, the most impressive part was that the pump was damaged (not sure if delivery issue or not) but the customer service was excellent - they immediately sent me a return label and shipped a new pump in 3 days. The new one was perfect. This is the mark of a truly professional company. No doubt I will purchase from them in future!

I recently purchased a Hayward Natural Gas 150,000 BTU pool heater and I was very pleased with the price.  When doing a price check comparison, Doheny's was $500.00 cheaper than other on-line competitors, as well as the local pool supply business.  I recommend using Doheny's if you want to save some $$$.  In addition, I ordered on a Friday and it was delivered by the following Tuesday.  That's service!!

I bought the "best" 3200 clear solar cover, 16 X 32 pool size.  Price and delivery were fine, and cover seems fine, but it was smaller than I expected.  I bought the 16 X 32 pool size, but was expecting the cover to substantially overlap (by a foot or two) the actual pool.  That is how our last cover fit, which came from the previous homeowner.  It overlaps the pool and we place some bricks around the periphery to hold it down.  Because this new cover fits "inside the pool", it is much more difficult to get the leaves, sticks, insects, and insect waste off the cover and keep it out of the pool.  We are completely surrounded by large mature trees, and this is a problem.  Bottom line is that I would buy at least an 18 X 34 for a 16 X 32 pool size, and probably even larger than that.

I ordered a sand filter for my inground gunite pool and the start up kit.The young lady that took my order was knowledgeable and very helpful.It arrived when promised and well packaged.I had a question about the manifold in the tank several days later( a simple question and the answer I found online about pool issues)I was told when calling Dohenys several times they have no one to answer tech Questions.....language issues and NO help at all! This is not right!Need more knowledgeable people on staff!!!

Fast service and good prices, but very poor customer service.  The agents are not knowledgeable in the products they sell.  I gave up trying to get advice on the phone and just took my chances purchasing online.  When the sand filter arrived, there were parts included that were not described in the instructions or illustrations.  I called twice for help with assembly, but both reps were clueless and told me I would have to consult a local installer.  I believe Doheney's outsources all customer service to India.

Made three attempts to order chlorine. Order was placed each time but a day later I received an email stating my order was cancelled due to a problem processing my credit card and I should contact my bank. I used a different card each time and there is no problem with any of them. I finally had to call and place my order with a customer service rep.

We ordered the above ground curved step system. Next day shipping was plastered all over the website, which was attractive as a customer. Once we placed order, there was a notice in red that we should expect shipping delays. It would’ve been more attractive if they were honest up front! Although, we did receive the steps a day later than expected which was still better than Amazon Prime….

21ft pool cover render useless due to tear. Despite product stating “exclusive non-tearing weave”which is a false claim, a replacement/refund was denied. Even after providing photos as requested by customer service.They then requested for a sample to be sent for “analysis”

I ordered a Doheny wide mouth skimmer sku# 7860, unaware that they (or no one else) sells a compatible winter plug. Their so called pool experts can provide no more information about their products than what is available on the website.

WOW, WOW!!! I placed my order for a pool heater on a Tuesday and it was delivered on a tractor trailer on Friday of the same week. The website stated it would take a week to be delivered, they outperformed. My customer is very happy. R&L carriers delivered on stated and the driver was extremely friendly and helpful.

Most of my order arrived promptly.  One item was damaged during delivery and Doheny’s was quick to acknowledge the issue and offer to re-ship or provide a refund.  Refund was handled promptly.  Great customer service!

Why did I have to goes through this hassle up on receiving the order it was the wrong order I had to call wait for a return receipt go out of my way to locate a Fed EX store for me to mail back the wrong order then it cost it me a additional $ 10.00 why did you put me through that
Doheny's generally has the best prices and ships in a more than reasonable amount of time.

Even though I was sent the wrong skimmer; the customer service was outstanding.  The representative understood what was needed and gave the proper return product info  to me. Received a prompt response on retrieving the  return skimmer.  Expecting  a refund with 48-72 hours.  No hassle return
Great company, with quality products, and awesome customer service.  I really appreciate them.
It was what I ordered,got here when you said it would and was the quality I wanted thank you
The delivery of the tarps and the price were right on point. The quality of the tarps are the same as ones that would be much more costly.
Ordered 2 tarps only got one. E mailed Bluetarps and told them. They replied right away, apologized and sent me the other one and got it in a couple days. Great customer service and great company.
Delivery was fast. Best fitting tarps I have bought in a long time.
When I order a specific size I expect that size. Nothing smaller. If you advertise that its 6x20 I expect 6x20. Not 5'6"×19'2"  these things are useless to me now.

I ordered a 15ft x 15ft Blue Tarp, from Blue Tarp.com which would have been perfect as a base sheet for the 15ft Above Ground pool, which we were having installed that day. Unfortunately the tarp measured exactly 14 feet 4 inches x 14 feet 4 inches, which is significantly different. In my frustration, I hastily typed a bad review, without consulting Blue Tarp. Immediately they got in touch with me, and sent me a 20' x 20' tarp, free of charge. That is great service, which I do appreciate. I would like to give 5 stars for such a prompt solution to my issue, but I feel that they should be more precise in their measurements, to avoid such issues with people like me in future.

I ordered the 18' x 24' Blue Tarp. I am a woodworker that builds furniture for my family.  I haul the items in the back of my pick-up truck so I have to protect them from the wind and rain.  My last tarp was a blue roof tarp I got from FEMA when Hurricane Ivan hit us in 2004.  It lasted a long time but finally needed replacement.  A friend recommended Blue Tarps so I ordered this one.  I hauled a large mahogany blanket chest to North Carolina and surrounded it with this tarp. It worked perfectly surviving 70 mph wind and rain associated with Hurricane Ian.  It remained like new. I recommend it whole-heartedly.
I found a nice simple tarp that I needed to cover my outside table and chairs. Other companies were selling super expensive covers. I just needed something basic and they had it. Thank you.

Extremely disappointed at the life of this product. Within minutes of laying the tarp down it was already showing signs of wear and holes started, it has been 4 days since putting it up and grommets are failing.

tarp arrived on time and was exactly what i ordered. the only thing i noticed was that the box it arrived in as well as the tarp smelled moldy. not really an issue since i will be using it outdoors. i ordered early as i will be actually using the tarp end of may and have not acually used it yet. hopefully it will be ok.
The tarps were as expected. Have not used them yet. Will cover a dog kennel on top and sides for my cats to get out of the weather.
You use the worst carrier UPS for delivery and it's then transferred to USPS for delivery. I will not purchase anything again from your company simply because you chose to use UPS................

This was my first time using your company. It was easy to order, and the delivery was super fast. I am very satisfied with your service and will recommend you to friends should they need anything from your website. Thank you!

The item was received with multiple defects. I attempted to use the cover but was unable to do so because several eye rings had been improperly installed. I contacted the company and filed for a refund with all the appropriate information and pictures on the 12th of October.  As of the 17th of October, I have not heard back from them.
I can't provide an accurate rating as I bought this as a gift. I had no problems ordering and it was received on time. After talking to the receipient they will only use it when needed

tarp looks good exactly the size I needed, I would give 5 stars but shipping was seemed a bit slow. To be fair, I think it was the shipper because the last leg took them couple of days to get from one town over.
Love the blue tarp. Ordered it to cover our pool during this very hot summer. Read where this will stop 95% of water evaporation. Love the price !! Thanks
Their service was very fast, convient and the price was also great. I would recommend this company for anyone who's looking for tarps.

Blue Tarps has great prices on quality, bulk items. My order was shipped 2 days after I ordered, and it was right after Christmas. I had a question for Customer Service and they got back to me right away and were very gracious. Thank you Blue Tarps!

I purchased 2 pool lights and 1 Spa light. Unfortunately the spa light color is not the same as my pool lights. The same Blue was ordered for both. I spoke with Danielle and I’m being told the reason the colors don’t match is because my pool is painted. My pool is not and has never been painted. She told me I have to take this up with the manufacturer. I am of the opinion this company’s customer service is less than desirable. I will never purchase from them again.

Spoke with Lillian on Friday 5/5 as I couldn’t track my delivery. She was very helpful and found out the order was not in the system. Gave me an update and said package would be here Saturday afternoon. Emailed tracking info. Very nice and courteous. Package was here Saturday afternoon, works great. Thanks Tom

I've been looking for a replacement pool light to replace my old fiber optic light. Local pool distributors were unable to steer me in the right direction. Poolweb was very helpful and new exactly what I was looking for I wish I spoke to them months ago. THANK YOU!

Norma was great to work with she found the parts I needed for my pool lift and was able to help get them to me the next day.  when installed the new parts and the lift still wasn't working correctly, she helps me trouble shot? and when got Gobal pool lift on the phone shortly we had the lift up and running this is excellent customer service
I recd a box of junk. They was not shrink wrapped. No protective materiel in box to protect the item. The box was destroyed due to lousy packaging of used materials.
Easy to work with, processed payment quickly. Shipment arrived. Much more quickly than expected which is always a plus. Seamless experience start to finish.
Saeed Hemati makes pool web excellent. No matter the item or the question he goes over and beyond to help get you the correct product. You have excellent pricing, but he is what makes you stand out.

After searching on line for a pool handrail sleeve, and finding very little color choice in the size I needed, I came across Pool Web and ended my search.  They had exactly what I wanted at a great price, and it arrived quickly.  The experience could not have gone better.  THANKS!
Have not installed the replacement part we purchased yet but customer service was wonderful.  Very helpful in helping us find the parts we needed.
Absolutely amazing purchase and follow-up support, shipping, and delivery. Norma was able to get us a pump and motor in 1 day which is crazy outstanding!
Super fast service…
Great company. Been looking for a hard to find replacement handle for valve on my sprinkler system. They had it. Definitely place to shop for hard to find items.  Fast shipping!
Tiles fit perfectly,  price is right and everything arrived on time and add plenty if protection to prevent the tiles from breaking.
Bridgette was honest and straightforward about how we could set up this deal - and the gear was delivered on the day we selected. Great job!
Customer service always makes the process , easy and trouble free. They are extremely professional and happy to help with all questions.
Customer service agent was very professional, and easy to talk to, and went out of her way to help me with my questions
I placed an order and have not received it as of yet.
The product arrived just as advertised. When placed in our skimmer, it performed perfectly.

I rarely write a poor review however this business and their practices and customer service are truly the worst. Please choose to give your hard earned dollars to a business that actually carries inventory; communicates with their customers, and provides support when an issue arises.
The water regulator came pretty quickly, was easy to install and is doing a great job.

I wasn't sure about the type of awning I had. After finding the sticker, the rep was able to pinpoint what I needed and very professionally and went through the parts. He called me the next day to confirm everything. It was a great transaction.
Quick easy checkout. Swift shipping. Appreciate the company.

I needed my part ASAP. I ordered online on Saturday, and it arrived on Tuesday. The only hiccup was that I never got an e-mail confirmation that it had shipped, and I had to request a status through the web site in Tuesday, thinking it had not shipped yet. By then, it was out for delivery, but because of my emergency I had ordered it again direct from the manufacturer with guaranteed next day delivery. Very fast, efficient service. Just could have used the information that it had shipped. I would definitely buy again!
I ordered the wrong motor just before I left the desert for Christmas holidays and an extended vacation, not returning until early February.
Great service! I sent pictures of my broken piece and received a fast reply. The parts were a perfect replacement and arrived quickly.
Excellent customer service, even on a weekend!  Very personable staff and able to get the right part ordered right away.
Part hasn’t been delivered said it was in stock now who knows when it’s going to be delivered!!
Parts were not in stock when purchase was made online however the parts were available within 10 days after order placed and were shipped. Supply chain must be efficient with thus company.@

Easy to order, and received my part in a short time and sooner than I expected. The only problem was the part had some damage, I was still able to install it. Also had to down load instructions to be able to install it.
Taylor was very helpful. He helped identify my particular awning and even provided me with an owners manual. He is currently attempting to identify my idler housing plastic covers.

The Plunger Kit arrived quicker than expected.  Included were all the parts and hardware required to install the anti-billowing kit from scratch.  Even the striker plate was in the package.  Only problem... All the parts and bolts were inside a zip-loc plastic bag which came open during shipping.  Every part, bolt, screw and seal was loose inside the box, some trapped under the bottom box flaps.

When the piece from our awning fell off I thought what is it going to take to find a replacement. I went to the qr code on the awning, and went right to the diagram of parts, clicked on the part I needed and it was that simple. It arrived quickly.

Outstanding service. Our RV awning caught 50 MPH winds from a freak storm. It was ripped to shreds. Unfortunately I could not move the RV until we repaired the damage. You guys came thru with flying colors, realizing the urgency and rushing my parts. Happy to say my awning is once again active thanks in big part to you guys. Special shout out to Taylor Hennessy. Thank you so much!!!

Reached out to get some info on an awning replacement for my rv over 2 months ago and have still have not heard back from them. Reached out for info on my certain model number awning before I purchased from their site to make sure I was ordering the correct item, but no response yet so went with another company that was very helpful.  Their website gives a email address “info@rvcarefree” on their “contact us” page so I tried but they never responded back to my email on 9/26/23.  Wish I could add a picture of my sent email which is date stamped and shows their email address since they are denying that I emailed them and saying that I contacted the wrong company in their reply below.

I had a wind incident that destroyed the idler arm on my awning.  Numerous attempts to get one thru RV repair places didn't work as they told me I would have to buy the whole set.  Just for fun I contacted CareFree and not only did they actually respond they contacted my RV manufacturer on my behalf to determine what arm I needed.  I was impressed by their timeliness and willingness to truly help me out.  And I was able to get what I needed not what some RV place wanted to sell me.  Well done and thank you.

Replacement lights for our travel van.  European style led lights for the porch.  All pieces came as promised.  It is not difficult to replace but pay attention to how the eyebrow snaps in place.  Double check to see it is secure.  The plastic does eventually fatigue and fail.  Therefore the replacement.
Well, first of all, I haven’t even received my purchase yet. So I can’t really judge the purchase and delivery process yet.
Customer service ensured that I had the correct part before finalizing my order. Good thing, because I had the wrong part ordered and it was not refundable. Thank you rvcarefree!

The camellia japonica plants were in great shape when received by my son-in-law.  I sent them as a Christmas gift and they should make great specimen shrubs by fall.  Well packaged and timely in delivery.
My mountain laurel arrived in perfect condition. I purchased two last year and they are both doing great, will have blooms this year. Thank you for supplying such quality plants!!

Although this is only my second order, I feel that there will be more in the future. Both times I have received well packaged healthy plants. I know have all 3 of the Smoothie Altheas- Blueberry, Peppermint and Strawberrry, unless there is another I don't know about.🤣
They accidentally shipped the wrong item, but they could not have been more responsive in addressing the problem when notified!  The replacement was here within a week.
The camellia was basically 7 rooted cutting shoved into a 3 ga nursery pot filled with large pine bark nuggets.
Mountain Laurel arrived in great time, looking SO happy and healthy! High hopes of it thriving and adding its loveliness to the yard.
Plant was barely 12 inches tall although sold in a 3 gal. pot.  I expected something twice the size for this price, as I had received from other nurseries.

Arrived when promised and in good condition.  Out of the 3 same plants I received, 2- were large and full, 1-was kind of small and not bushy at all, but I kept it.  I like a challenge.  I will use this company again when in need.

The plants I received were healthy and had well established roots. I planted them about 5 days after receiving them, and they are looking great. The plants aren't cheap, but worth every penny. Especially considering I bought the same plants from another vendor last year and they look pathetic compared to the plants I received from Lots of Plants. I highly recommend Lots of Plants for your gardening needs.
Our camellia arrived in perfect condition. It’s been planted and is already blooming!! We are delighted with this plant!
Beautiful, healthy plants shipped quickly.  What more can I say?  Will definitely order again.  Great company.

Majority are f plants made unscathed, 2 plants were out of there pots/roots exposed and 1 of Rose Sharon does not look very healthy. Only reason I’m saying this is I hope the 2 plants exposed and the 1 unhealthy looking rose of Sharon do not die after being installed.
My plant came broken and dry. Instructions said send pictures via email. It took about a half hour to find the email. I took pictures and sent the email. No response yet
The Monkey Tree was delivered in perfect, healthy, intact conditions! Will definitely buy again from you. Highly recommended seller of hard-to-find plants. Very satisfied customer here.
I use a lot of mail order tree services and this company’s packaging is the best I have ever seen!!!
The plant arrived looking healthy, a little smaller than I thought it would be for the price, but looks healthy. Put it in the ground that day (Tuesday).
The bushes arrived in just a couple of days and were in great shape. I’m still waiting for one of them to start growing but my experience with this company is that they send the best quality.

Got our three Camillas today. They all arrived healthy some even with flowers. One was packaged in a slightly smaller box than was appropriate and the top was folded over with one branch broken. However, the remainder of the plant seems healthy and would expect it to do OK.
The service & the plant were impeccable. Nicely done. Thanks.

We are repeat customers. The plants we have received from Lots of Plants have been exceptional cultivars, healthy, larger and more well-established than from other vendors. They are very carefully packed for shipment and arrive unscathed.  They really take off planted in their new garden!

I ordered four track lights through Amazon in August of 2023; however, the packages were not opened until March 2024. The contractor doing our home renovation noticed that one of the lights was damaged (it had a bend in the arm). I contacted Torchlight customer support to inform them of the issue. I received a call back the same day and followed up with an email with supporting pictures. The customer rep, Ruby, replied back the next day informing me that the normal policy is a replacement within 30 days of purchase but she spoke to the team and received a one-time exception to provide a replacement. The process was quick, efficient, and demonstrated an understanding of the customer! Needless to say, I was impressed with their approach and recommend them without hesitation. I wish more companies would respond to customer issues like Ruby and her team.  Great support!

I damaged 1 of my pathway lights and needed to replace it. On the LeonLite site a single item was not available (sold as a pkg of 8) and I reached out to TorchStar from who I had gotten a warranty replacement lamp a while back (a pleasant 1st experience). I was provided info to purchase a single lamp there, received the lamp (took a week due to a USPS delay), wired it in, walkway is all bright again.
The four lights ordered were replacing four lights that went out from our original set from April 24, 2023 which should have been under warranty.

I had a landscape light fail, and their customer service rep, Ruby, made it extremely easy to get a replacement.  I had to show what was going on by sending a simple picture, and my new light is being shipped.
Ease of assembly made it easy to swap out a light fixture gone bad. My lights are embedded in a stone wall, taking the wall apart to change out the light would have been a major pain in my ass!
I recently purchased some Leonite landscape lights to illuminate my sidewalk. They were easily installed, stylish and performed beautifully.  Until about a month ago. One of the six lights failed.
They are made of high quality, easy to install and exactly as advertised. They are perfect!

I ordered a pkg of 8 from Wayfair towards end of Sept 2023. They were installed by our handyman in mid October. Two of the units stopped working and went out. I ordered replacement units and followed up with customer service. Great service, continued with follow-up by a very dedicated representative. It's rare these days to see such interest to make sure the customer is in good hands. Thank you, Ruby.
Couldn’t find my replacement lights at either Home Depot or Lowe’s. Went to the Leon Light website to order and I received them in a few days. Exactly what I needed.
PRO: Had the light I wanted (metal with long warranty and beam projection) along with the anodization. They also had the wire nuts for my project at a good price.
Free shipping. Quality products. You can see and feel the quality when you have the light fixture in your hand.  Very well made.  Excellent price compared to others.
Marlena and her team helped me select the correct housings for the lights I had purchased.
The product was delivered ahead of schedule. And in good condition.
Did what you said you would do
Great product and service. Lights look totally awesome. Installation and connection to app was very simple. Great job Leonlite team !!
Good service. I ended up making a mistake and ordered 2 warm lights instead of the lights that
Prompt delivery and quality product
Great customer service. My product was out of warranty, but they still gave me a good deal on a replacement walkway light.
Quality made product in materials and finish. Only negative is the poor connectors sold with the system expecting the wiring to be cut and wire nutted at each light location.
Great delivery, great product

Brady Irrigation and Outdoor Lighting provided superior customer service and quality workmanship on my job.  After having a pool installed, my irrigation was a mess!  My irrigation system had to be completely redone.  They were professional all the work was finished as promised.  I highly recommend their services.
It was very simple to schedule online,

Brady irrigation is a top notch service provider. They reviewed our system and set it up so it would cover our irrigation needs. Several other companies worked on it over the last few years, one making it worse than when they started. Burning money and unable to put the fire out. Thanks To Brady irrigation for peace of mind.

Mr. Brady returned our call for service at our house we're selling promptly and came out to review our problem with very little wait time. He was so helpful in solving problems with failing sprinkler heads and repairing/ replacing them. After such stellar service, I have decided to call him for an estimate on an irrigation system in our new house.
They have made ever effort to correct the problem. Great reliable company.

Athens put a price that was significantly less than any of the other three surgeon companies. They arrived on time, cut down for huge trees, carrying them over the house with the crane, and cleaned up as if they had never been there before. I am very satisfied, and will not hesitate to call them in the future.

I have had the pleasure of having Brady Irrigation installing irrigation and lighting at my home.  They are excellent to work with. I especially like the fact that they came at the scheduled appointment time. The work done was completed efficiently and was exactly as expected.  This is a dependable, experienced and professional business.
Great company with caring and professional employees. I highly recommend them for your irrigation and home lighting needs.

I was having problems with a flood light and they replaced it and I didn’t thank that was part of their work scope. And another time they unclogged my gutters Downspout which drained into the yard and both jobs the price was less than what I expected.
Lighting problem was fixed quickly and professionally.  Another issue was also fixed at the same time without having to make second appointment.  Very kind and considerate to do this for us.
Showed up on time.  Helped to stay within our budget by offering different solutions to the problem. Complete the work on time.
Chris is always prompt and efficient. The Brady Irrigation and Outdoor Lighting website is easy to navigate through for information/payments. All in all, a well run company you can count on.
On time, price as agreed and did a great job fixing the system!!!  Highly recommend.
On time arrival and a known reliable resource from his work on my mothers home.
Always listens to the problem.  Always on time and takes the time to correct what needs to be done. And I am always satisfied!
Mr. Brady was very prompt attending to my problem and very informative to my problem.
Performed a great service in short order!  Chris was very kind and professional.
This company and Chris Brady are a pleasure to work with. And when you need them they are always available.
Professional and on time for the appointment
Chris is always on time and very professional. Thank you
Installation instructions were weak at best! We spent 2 hours fixing installation re-do's.

The pergolas (we bought two) are beautifully made and very substantial. Be ready for delivery with some strong people: the truck shows up and you've got to get a bunch of 100+ pound boxes off and put away. We hired a crew of 3 handymen and they had it done in 4-5 hours. Installed on a Trex deck; added 2x6s between the joists and bolted the posts all the way through.
The service was excellent throughout and the product quality is exceptional.  Thank you, Hansø. I loved my four pergolas

The quality of the product is very good.  However, their claims that this is easy to assemble and 2 adults can do it in 4 hours are ridiculous.  You can’t even open the boxes and unwrap the pieces in 4 hours.  This is easily a 2 full day job for 2 adults - think 12 hours, not 4.
Would have rated 5 stars, as every part of my interactions with Hanso were great.....until delivery.
Hanso delivered both a good product and value.  The team was responsive to questions and knowledgeable about the product.

From the delivery, the heavy duty, double packaging of the material, the labeling of the pieces parts, the perfect fit and the finish, you've met my expectations. Wherever I had a question with the installation instructions your staff were quick to respond and provide a satisfying clarification.
We like the the awning however it didn't do so well with the snow load
Looks really fancy and sturdy, I had help with a professional for installation and it took them 5 hours. Worth the investment, we are spending more time in our backyard
Product is very well made.  Everything fit together nicely.  Easy to install except a few directions could have been a little more detailed.  Would buy another one if I needed it.
Easy to assemble, other than one hole being slightly off, everything fit together nicely the first time

Absolutely outstanding service from Hanso Home during a very challenging time for my family. We had initially purchased a pergola from them, but unfortunately had to cancel the order due to a fire at our home. Without hesitation, Hanso Home showed immense understanding and compassion towards our situation by refunding the full amount of the purchase, waiving any restocking fees that could have been applied. It's rare to encounter a company that stands so firmly beside its customers during their times of need. Their support has been a silver lining during these difficult times. I cannot recommend Hanso Home enough for not only their high-quality products but also their exceptional customer care and empathy. Five stars all the way!

I ordered the 10 ft by 10 ft charcoal colored pergola. It is exactly as described. It took three men four hours to put it up. And that's not bad considering they've never seen this product before or use this product or ever put up a pergola. All of the parts were exactly manufactured to the t, all the holes were drilled in the right place, all of the parts were there and labeled clearly. I love that the louvers open and close and I love the modern look of it in my backyard.
Delivery was on time. Assembly instructions were clear and went well. Finish product is attractive and functional.
This pergola is very high quality. It was easy to assemble and looks just like the $35,000 pergolas. All aluminum, clean lines and beautiful.

Awesome value, awesome quality!  This pergola is commercial grade and looks beautiful.  Completely waterproof with the louvers down and easy to assemble.  I live in western NY where we have frequent windstorms with gusts over 70 MPH.  No match for this pergola.

The service was excellent, from ordering to delivery.  I had an issue with wrong support posts and it was immediately resolved and sent the right support posts.  Installation went without a hitch.  Pergola is structurally sound.  We have had windy days and you don’t hear any moving parts making any squeaking noises.  I would highly recommend Hanso pergola to anyone.

Like a lot of people, I’ve been working on renovating/improving my backyard patio and outdoor space to make use of and enjoy during the milder months.   Once I got my new deck done, I started looking at louvered pergolas so I could use that part more.  Hansø Home fit all my needs.  The look of the pergola perfectly matched my new deck railing, the louvered aspect of the pergola would keep shade during warmer months and cover during lighter rain.   In September I pulled the trigger and ordered a 10’x13’ pergola.
Customer service was A+

Hanso did a great job is answering all our questions and walked us through the build process. I ordered the largest pergola with all the bells and whistles. They even threw in a complimentary item! There customer service is top notch and I’d recommend them to anybody in the market for a pergola.

I bought and assembled a 14x24 Annex garage that Summerwood customized for me. It went together seamlessly and the design, shipping and technical support was the best you could imagine. Precise execution, fantastic quality, and an overall genuinely great experience. AND they are RUSH fans :)

I bought a 9x9 Urban Studio from summerwood earlier this year to use as an office. The whole process from start to finish has been 5 stars. Design, shipping, communications, install and finished product have all surpassed expectations.

Though my husband and I had dropped by multiple times before, we got to know Summerwood better this time.  On a personal level, John fully grasped our requirements and then suggested options that aligned with our needs and budget.

Summerwood was a pleasure to work with from the design phase right down to installation. My husband found this company on the internet after doing some research.  We had an idea of what we wanted and Summerwood brought our idea to life using the Verana Model.  We customized some of the pieces.  When someone enters our backyard, our cabana is now a feature piece that everyone comments on.  The install process was also smooth.

Ross met me on a weekend which made it easier for me as I did not need to take time off work.  He was able to answer all my questions and confirmed that the additional materials for my building permit would be provided by Summerwood. Thank you !

The whole experience was positive except that I had a little trouble with the online design system that led me to have some uncertainty about what I was ordering. All my questions were answered once humans were involved. I was a little surprised at how quickly a 50% deposit was required. Aside from that, everything else has been positive so far.

We bought our Summerwood shed in the 1990s--it was the first thing that we purchased over the Internet.  We have been delighted with it ever since.  It has held up extremely well and consistently draws compliments (I think we have helped sell three Summerwood sheds to folks who visited our backyard).  We are replacing the window boxes (they can't last forever), but the main structure is still in great condition.  Service then and now is outstanding.  We highly recommend this company and their products.
Summerwood knocked this one out of the park.  11' Catalina (pre-cut) went together flawlessly.

Our prefabricated 14' Monterey gazebo was delivered from their factory to our home in the Northern burbs of Chicago in February 1994. It was erected that May and after 30 years it has weathered every season since. Only the cedar shakes have been replaced. The Canadian Western Red Cedar construction shows no sign of deterioration. You can always tell the measure of a company by the after sale support. Summerwood has continued to support our needs for 30 years and counting. Thanks to the entire Summerwood team. Much appreciated. Rob M.

Summerwood is a great company to work with. Our kit was delivered to our job site. The included build instructions were a little generic for our kit, but when we called the office they were extremely helpful and were able to walk our foreman through the entire build. Our client is very happy with her Sanara pool cabana.

We are building a home in the Beaches and are considering a shed in the back yard. We spent the better part of the afternoon with John who provided us with a full understanding of the materials, design, size, base options, and happily answered all our many questions. John gave us a detailed quote on the spot.There is no doubt that summerwood products and John's friendly and professional customer service is superior. No need to look further.

Summerwood Products supplied and installed my Catalina Cabana approximately 8 years ago. Extremely happy with there product and workmen ship, well designed and constructed. Recently had the flower boxes replaced, looks like the day it was installed. Great team of people to work with, very polite and professional, took the time to go over and explain the process which made my decision so much easier. They have a great line of products and designs to choose from for any outdoor projects your are thinking about starting.

I did a lot of research looking for a Bunkie for our cottage property . Summerwood had the most flexibility  and was able to provide us with the design we wanted. And their online tool was easy to use. John and the engineers were also available to answer our many questions. It was a pleasant experience. Thank you.

We absolutely love our new Summerwoood bunkie but unfortunately cannot say the same about the buying experience.  We ordered a model very similar to the show model and were really surprised to receive the show model - without the changes we had requested.  When we let the salesperson know of the mistake, he insisted that the mistake was ours, that we had in fact ordered the show model.  After much frustrating back and forth, we did get a small rebate from the owner.  Great product, not a great sales experience!

We have purchased two garden sheds, the Palmerston (20+ yrs old) and the Sarawak 7yrs old.  Recently we noticed that the flower boxes on the Palmerston needed replacing, when I called Summerwood after all these years Anthony was very helpful for organizing the replacements.  Both our sheds have stood the test of time and to this day we recieve compliments from passers by on how nice they look.  I highly recommend Summerwood.

Initial phonecalls requiring information were handled promptly and with professionalism. Drawings rendered were well delineated. The products, including all materials, are of top notch quality. There were a few glitches with installation but the company handled those with aplomb and finesse.

The product and build is excellent. The features ordering process was somewhat complicated. The cedar window door and vents could not be obtained pre-protected in the natural cedar colour. We are seniors and not handy persons. Our shed was installed in November when lightly snowing and it has been extremely cold and snowing since then so we have been unable to apply the recommended finish that was purchased by us. Please offer your customers a cedar door and vents that have at least one coat of protector/finish prior to the build so this does not happen to others!

Overall we are very pleased with the purchase of our Palmerston shed. From the initial purchase through to the final installation all went smoothly. John & Anna were very helpful in the purchase and the logistics of the shed delivery and installation. The installers did a superb job and were very friendly and obviously care about their work. My only criticism would be that l

We purchased a customized Sarawak Lean-To shed and are absolutely thrilled with our choice. We were able to move everything out of the garage and storage into the shed with lots of room to spare. The shed is absolutely gorgeous with all cedar trim and it's probably sturdier than our actual house.

This year, we ordered a pool bar design from Summerwood. The end result is even better than we could of imagined - the beautiful cedar really pops against the dark blue walls and we absolutely love the bar windows. We set up a tv inside and have enjoyed watching it sitting at the bar. After many years of researching various companies, we are so very happy that we went with Summerwood. The quality is outstanding and we are so thrilled with our purchase!
Customer Service is amazing. They helped me through a light issue and sent me a part quickly. Very friendly and supportive!
Very helpfull customer service. Out of all the places I called they are the only one who didn't rush me and answered all my questions without making me feel rushed. I would recommend to all.
Great quality product. Surpassed my expectations, I am a touch critic! I’ve had other products and this was far superior
We had our light for about 2 years. We absolutely loved it. It stopped working and the customer service to figure out what was wrong and get it repaired was fantastic.
Your staff was great and my only complaint was how long it took to receive the lights.

The light arrived timely and as promised.  It took less than 5 minutes to install.  It’s fantastic in our canal.  At least a dozen 2 foot snook circle the light like they’re in a trance.  Love it…thanks!  It’s worth every penny.

I purchased the 60 watt drain plug light for my husband for Christmas on December 11th. On December 13th I was informed that it was going to take approximately an additional week to make and that a free mini britebite would be thrown in as a courtesy due to it being late. I was impressed by the quick communication and the gift as a courtesy. The drain plug light was delivered on December 26th, after Christmas, and a britebite was never thrown in. We have not installed just yet so I cannot give an honest review on the quality. I was ultimately impressed until the item showed up after Christmas and the promise was never met with disappointment to follow.
Excellent product and service. Ordered 16 lights they work and look great
Great customer service on our green light. Problem with the brightness. They tested and replaced it. Highly recommend this company

I bought the mini bright in a green color. I've used it off my dock on two occasions and I'm surprised at how bright the light is at 12 volts dc.  It attracted several fish, smaller ones right away and larger fish within 15-20 minutes  Very pleased and will purchase a 120 volt unit for permanent install at dock

Light is AWESOME! I put it about 15 ft deep in lake texoma which is pretty green/pretty low light penetration, light is amazing, easily puts out a 50ft diameter of light even that deep in pretty murky water. 1st night it had bait around it, took about a week for bass,striper, crappie, catfish, alligator gar to start showing up, after a month they are there every single night now, its like having a huge aquarium, was going to get two smaller lights but very glad i went ahead and got the larger one, more than worth the money!!

The piling mounted LED lights are amazing.  Super bright and easy to install.  We started receiving compliments from neighbors and people passing by on their yachts immediately.  Will be ordering two more lights for the remainder of our dock.
Great stuff. Owner is a great person

They were out of the green light before my fishing trip, so I ordered what seemed like a comparable one from one of their competitors while waiting for it to become available. I just now received it and compared the two side by side. Wow!! Not even close. It hurt my eyes more than looking at the sun. I can actually look directly at the competitors for awhile without it hurting.

Really love the light!! It's like watching an aquarium!! Instalation was easy and the suggestions in the instructions were very helpful. Highly recommend it to anyone that wants to attract fish and make your dock look better!!

This light is fantastic. It attracts tons of bait fish and which draws in the game fish at night. It lights up a very large area underwater. Quality built and should last a long time. They refunded my fast shipping fees due to a delay in getting the product on hand, and then still shipped it with accelerated shipping. Highly recommend!
Prestige Meridian Park is a luxury residential development cluster in The Prestige City Township Developed By Prestige Group, located in the idyllic location of Ittangur on Sarjapur road Bangalore.
Great company with extremely

We purchased an underwater light at the boat show. We loved it so much that we purchased a second one a month later at another boat show. The color saturation of the light is superior to any of the other lights I see in our neighborhood. Thank you, Ryan, for your  professionalism and great service.
Fast, easy ordering service. Website is really easy to navigate and pick what you want.
Everything is going good so far and the builders will do a great job with the build. I wondering if you sell the green metal panels and what would they cost

This company was a pleasure to do business with. Everyone was friendly, professional and efficient. The product was delivered and installed within a few weeks. The quality of the product was excellent and the installers were experienced and willing to do whatever it took to make sure it was done properly. I’m very happy with the end result and would highly recommend Alan’s Factory Outlet.

Great website that allows you to `build` the structure you want with pricing included. After ordering I was contacted and informed what additional information was needed. I sent that information (site pictures) and they acknowledged it was received and was being sent to manufactured. This all happened in less than one business day. I hope the rest of the process goes as smoothly.
Every time I called with a question, everyone was so nice and knowledgeable.  Web site was easy to navigate. Process has been easy and communication has been great.
The online design tool is great. It's nice to be able to see the design and color options which helps visualize the building on my property. So far I'm very pleased with AFO support.
So far everything has been wonderful.  The website is easy to create your design, the customer service is A+++.  You always get someone on the phone.  Even emailing is fast and speedy for replies!

The process was so easy. You can design you building, see it in real time, make adjustments if needed and then order it. Once ordered Alan’s will be in touch with you through the process with phone calls and emails to make sure everything is going smooth.

Alans Factory was amazing with there side of the transaction but when it was difficult when it came to communicating with Carolina Carports. They will call you but don't expect them to answer when you call them. The installers were professional, quick and did a great job. They communicated very well. I would use Alans Factory Outlet again with the expectation that Carolina Carports will be difficult to talk to if you have any questions.

The web site is great! After placing order was contacted almost immediately. I have yet to have product delivered and installed but communication has been really good. Paperwork is very detailed and was able to electronically sign etc.

The planning and ordering process was very easy and went well. Lacy was patient and knowledgeable as we went through the construction design and gave us a detaile: on how things would go from here on out… we hope the rest of the process is as efficient….

Customer service has been very good through the ordering process.  They have checked with me several times on the order.  Only issue I had, was that I ordered my shed and then signed up for an account. If you place the order prior to setting up an account, they can not tigh your order into that account. Even if both emails are the same.
I have received professional support and service from everyone involved in helping me on this project. Well mannered, kind, and supportive. Thank the entire staff so much. God Bless you all always.

We needed a carport for our new large van because it didn’t fit in the garage.  So I did research several websites and local businesses.  The Alan site for me was the easiest for me to order the dimensions that we needed.  After we ordered it it was installed much sooner than expected so we have had a great experience

My husband and I are extremely satisfied with our new garage. This company made it so easy for us to pick out what size, style and color of our garage and see it even before it was built. The gentlemen that installed it were very nice and professional. They worked hard and steady until it was completed.

This experience has been a little drawn out due to trying to get my surface as flat as possible for the installation.  Asking for additional pictures of the site with the four corners marked is taking some time due to weather conditions but should be accomplished this weekend.  Overall, so far, it has been a pleasurable experience to get my carport ordered.  we will see how the delivery and installation go.

Carport was ordered through Alans Factory/Carolina Carports approximately 1 week ago. Of course nothing has been received or built as of yet. However the on line order has gone smoothly thus far. According to received emails delivery & construction should begin within 1 to 2 months. I deleted 2 previous email requests for a ratings service review. It was my original desire to hold off on placing a service rating request until the project was completed. However since this is the 3rd request for a star rating without any work being done I will comply with an above average rating. Hopefully the project will go as planned.

From designing the building online, to calling for details and adding a lean to, everything was flawless. I visited numerous other websites and nobody had software as easy to use as Alans Factory Outlet. I had no issues figuring out how to design and manipulate the software. The pricing was consistent no matter when I went on the website. Not one that pushes you to order immediately or lose the discount.
First: The website is constructed awesome! I like how you can pick your own layout and play with different features.

Today 2-16-24 still no carport, unbelievable. This is terrible results. Eagle carport that is suppose to come install , truck broke down, still waiting. I was advised to seek an attorney.Ridiculous waiting over two months for a carport.

Easy ordering process. They emailed me to confirm I wanted copper style and not real copper. Maybe just trying to upsell, but still the same they were double checking. Unfortunately, the double checking and waiting to process my order delayed our pool installer. We needed the scuppers the following week and bc of the emails and late phone call, they arrived the following Friday night. That was the only bummer/hiccup. As a first time buyer from this company I would have expedited the shipment without cost to client just to keep my business.  Product seemed nice and sturdy. The people on the phone were nice.

I recently had the pleasure of doing business with Majestic Water Spouts, and I have nothing but praise for their exceptional service and product range. From the moment I began exploring their offerings to the final installation of my selected water features, the experience was nothing short of excellent.
The only stop for pool scuppers - variety and price and customization can't be beat.
the rep i delt with was great , fast and straight to the point and i got my package within a suitable time as an overseas customer , i will be doing business with this company again for sure
Nanette was responsive and exceptional with her suggestions. I’m excited to tackle this backyard pond rejuvenation project and thrilled to have a specialty vendor like this company available.
Very easy to navigate and quick turn around.  A little disapopointed that it is going to take 6 weeks to fabricate
High Quality Product. Fast Shipping. Never had a problem with damaged packages or products. Will continue to buy from Majestic Water Spouts.
Took a week to get to me but my client will love it.

The stainless steel piece they sent was very heavy and well made.  Great quality.  Before I ordered, I called the company. They immediately answered my questions.   I would order form them again without hesitation.

I had no knowledge of "scuppers", and was lucky enough to find a company on-line. I, actually, got a real live person on the phone, who suggested several types of scuppers. I viewed them on-line as we were talking. I placed the order, and paid, and it was shipped a few days later, since I was having them painted. They are being installed as I am writing this review. I am very pleased with this company, and their product.
Product is amazing, I can’t wait for them to be installed.

I contacted Majestic Water Spouts to enhance my pool remodel and fountain addition. From the outset my Customer Service Representative  Sammy B handled my purchase and delivery flawlessly.  My purchase arrived on time, in perfect condition, and has been a stunning addition to my water feature.  Hats off to Majestic Water Spouts for a great product and grat customer service

Cheyenne has been really great helping us work through a problem we had. It turns out it is our fault and we are still working through it but she has been professional and engaged with helping us find a solution.
Samantha was very polite and knew what she was talking about. Great customer service and great product that I needed to finish my project.
They have great products and great customer service!
Nanette was very responsive in facilitating expedited shipment on a delayed order fulfillment. Order then arrived today, when expected.

We were there little after closing time on a Friday and Monday was going to be a holiday so no other place to buy anything and we needed to finish our work that Saturday . but they still help us . So that was very nice.

Great customer service. I placed an order and the machine that would manufacture my items broke down. I received an email explaining the issue and delay. LabJack has excellent customer support & service. The people are always knowledgeable, helpful, and friendly. Their products are reliable, and of the thousands of devices ordered, the few devices I have had to get support with they have been quick to solve the issue or replace the device if necessary.
Versatile and easy to implement

I use U6-pros with Python for DAQ.  Multiple (20) projects over the last decade -they work great.  Response from company, I think I've asked 2 questions, (I like email) is quick, concise and correct.  For those complaining about the documentation, I say spend 1 hour "actually" reading the manual and you'll have no problems, EVERYTHING is documented.  Good products, high accuracy.  I'm still buying them.  Tick-products are a bit expensive.

The LJtick-R device doesn't give stable enough data for my application (measuring R around 25 ohms). I received a call from tech support that confirmed the device will not work well to measure such lo resistance. So I built my own interface for the measurement, which is working better.

First time Labjack user.  The first datalogging project involved using the SD card to log temperature/voltage data.  At first documentation was a bit confusing regarding how to access the SD card.  Customer support was able to get me the SD card utility to read out the logged data which was helpful.

Solomon was fantastic!!!  He put up with so many back and forth questions and was so patient with me. Your lab jack has worked out so well.  I coupled it with daq factory per your site recommendation and we have a fantastic logging tool with graph and save functions. Thanks!
My T7 lab jack is pretty much my go to device for all things experimental.  It’s easy to reconfigure and get useful data coming in and controls going out.

Support helped me understand how feedbackArguments were sent to getFeedback() in python. Had struggled for some time, thinking I had to create new feedbackArguments every call, since I wanted to change state of u3.BitStateWrite(14, LCLsetting['SWactivLEDst']) output each time. Once I realized the setup did not need to be change, just change the ...LEDst, it saved cycle time in my call. Thanks!
Labjack U3 user. Nice product, mature, available for a long time, performs as promised.

Hey! I've used with LabJack products for a while now and they're working as intended. Their forum support is also great, they're answering to all your questions in little to no time and they're also very helpful.

The LabJack is flexible, powerful and pretty bulletproof.  What I like most is that it hits a sweet spot in terms of capability, flexibility and price.  I use it in a research setting for control and automation of experiments involving thermal chambers, fluid loops and heat transfer measurements.  I've used it in both mechanical lab and wet-lab settings.  The T7 is basically my testing swiss army knife.  In all my setups, the T7 was never the failure point or bottlekneck.

We are a small company in Austin, Texas. We have used the LabJack model U3, T4 & T7 to build customized test and production equipment. This product has met every challenge raised in meeting our needs for automation and control! And the best part is the great Customer Support we've received when needed! Thanks for a great product and even better service!
So far, I've encountered LJ DAQs used in university student engineering teams, university laboratories, and in industry. In all these settings, I have only ever heard glowing reviews about the DAQs.

I'm a part of a college design team that used LabJack equipment to run our data acquisition and controls for a liquid rocket engine our team developed. The LabJack equipment worked great and we were able to test 2 separate engines on 4 different occasions! Big thanks to the LabJack team for their support of our team and their great equipment!
We have been a customer of Labjack for number of years now.  Our startup company owns 3 T7 pros in addition to numerous add ons (LJTicks), Mux80 etc.
The good: hardware is solid.  T7-pro resolution is appreciated.  Kipling and LJM are better than expected.  Running quadrature encoders is appreciated.  Smooth handshake with Visual Studio.

Very useful device. I purchased this when I was doing a lot of embedded systems design and troubleshooting. It was useful for scripting long-running tests withouth having to muck with hardware too much. The Python API is straightforward.

I was new to LabJack products and not familiar with much of the terminology used. After only a few emails, I had all the information I needed to connect 12 thermocouples up to a T7 using a Mux80 and two CB37 cards. The information available on the web site is very, very helpful, especially the guides. Hardware and software both are great.
Excellent data loggers
I used both LabJack T7 & U6 with each of
