Fast service, item exactly as described, fair price
Working as it's advertising, fast shipping, fit like original one, hard to find in this sizes thank you.

I recently purchased a filter from Microwave Filter Inc and I couldn't be happier with my decision. The quality of the filter surpassed my expectations and it fits perfectly in my appliance. Not only does it effectively capture impurities, but it also seems to enhance the performance of my appliance. The purchasing process was smooth and the delivery was prompt. I highly recommend Microwave Filter Inc to anyone in need of high-quality filters. Their products are top-notch and their customer service is excellent!
Fabulous product and perfectly wrapped for shipping!

Filters were delivered promptly after placing order.  Only negative was that I had to guess on how to install them, as the design is different from the OEM filter.  An instruction sheet, or better yet, link to a video showing installation would be nice.

The filters are very flimsy.  They were damaged during transit. Shipped between 2 cardboard pieces.  Damaged by post office, received bent and crack in frame.  The original filters are very sturdy and opaque, while the ones I received are transparent and the frame bends very easily.
Good quality,quick to ship and reasonably priced
The product was exactly what I needed and at a fair price. Quick delivery as well. Overall a positive experience.

Even though my microwave is from 2007 and branded Goldstar, the model number came up LG (who bought Goldstar), so I took a chance that these grease filters would fit and thankfully they did. Delivered quickly and in good order.

I am so happy that I found Air Filter Factory for my microwave filters.  I been looking for these filters for some time at our local Home Improvement stores and couldn't find the correct size.  I thought I found a filter but it did not fit. These filters fit PERFECTLY.
Filter arrived quickly and was a perfect fit for a hard to find size. Thrilled to have found this source for a quality replacement and would definitely buy again.

The main issue I had was with shipping and packaging I received the Item damaged. The post office bent the package in shipping. the filter was packed between two pieces of cardboard and put in an envelope a box would have been better to keep from damaging the filter. I was able to somewhat straighten out the filter to were I was able to use it but the finger ring broke off. I did receive a replacement without asking so I'm raising it to five stars.

Product pricing excellent and fair with great customer service and shipping time frame. The only negative is that I had to call to place my order rather than order "online" because I simply did not want to accept the "cookies agreement".
Prices are reasonable and the shipping was fast. Second time I have ordered and been pleased both times. Will continue ordering from here for my filters.
They never sent any emails as far as when it would be sent or if it had even been sent. I kind of thought that that was the norm for online purchases.

This company was the only one I found online that had the part I needed because Bosch had discontinued it. It was easy ordering the part online, and I received it about a week after ordering it. I received emails confirming my order and confirming my shipping and tracking number. I am very happy I found this company for microwave parts.
Sent the wrong size first when I realized this they sent me the right size immediately at no additional charge and were very friendly throughout the interaction

It was difficult to find a replacement for GE WB02X11534 Grease Mesh Microwave Oven Filters.  Not available through GE or Amazon.  I stumbled across Microwave Filter Inc By Air Filter Factory by online search.  I was skeptical at first, but pleased to see that products were made in the USA.  Upon prompt receipt, I am more than pleased.  These filters are true to size, nice and plump with plentiful shreds of aluminum filament.  Probably better than the original filters.  Needless to say, they work great!  I highly recommend!  Thank you.
Exactly what I needed for my humidifier. Exact fit great quantity, and quality, cheaper than others delivery was on time and pretty fast.

This was the only company who had the size filter I needed for my range hood, so I took a chance and ordered from them. The filter arrived quickly and fits perfectly. They are my new source for filters!
Information on the web site was accurate and complete. The parts were exactly as expected. Delivery was quick and correct. Overall, just the way it should be.
Good price, prompt service and delivery!
I ordered a filter for a 33 year old range hood that was a perfect fit. The quality was excellent and customer service is the best. I would definitely recommend this company.

This is my third time ordering these filters for three votive candle stands at our church. They work very well and we only have to change them out every 3 years! The prices have stayed pretty consistent over the last 6 years ,too! Delivery is very fast.
WOW! Great service! I ordered and had the filters 6 days later. Great Experience! I will be ordering from Air Filter Factory again.
Well packed and was as described and arrive on time for an international order from Canada. I would definitely recommend them!
Expedient delivery of exactly what I ordered and in great shape
Good prompt service. I haven't  tried them yet but assume they will fit.
The gentleman I spoke to on the phone was courteous and helpful!

For starters your company had exactly the filters we needed to replace the ones that had been in our vent hood since we purchased it. The website was easy to navigate and I found my item in a matter of minutes. The package just arrived today 1/6/24 and was packed really well and arrived in excellent condition. I might make one suggestion perhaps you could include the metal mounting clips with future orders. Thanks again for a great experience. Blessings.
easy to order, cost less.

I am so thankful I found your company and decided to order from you! I hadn't been able to find replacement filters that were anywhere close to the originals in quality. The last set I ordered direct from the range hood manufacturer -- they were downright flimsy, and so thin they started to sag and sometimes fall out of the hood! NOT THE CASE with the ones from you though. They're actually better quality than the originals! I've been telling my friends to order from here because I'm so happy with the quality.
very fast delivery. would order again when filters are needed.
You keep asking for feedback on a crappy little filter you have not shipped to me.  Send me surveys after the product has shipped.

Had trouble ordering my filters on the website and then had to call twice to get my complaint properly entered into their voice mail. However, I received a prompt and friendly voicemail from an actual person who resolved my issue quickly and professionally. I would order from this company again because the customer service was so good.
The filters work great, that's why I ordered them again.  It didn't take long to receive them.
This team was very conscientious. They were great in replacing my order where I had ordered the incorrect size. Kudos to them
I have purchased filters from the air filter factory before. I was extremely pleased with the fit, the quality and the price. Ordering was easy and delivery time was excellent. Thank you.
John Hudson always goes out of his way to provide great Customer service. That type of service is rare, indeed.
Customer service is awesome, and website is easy to use.
2 months ago, new customer expanded their interest of new products. RFQ sent to John McCall, samples for approval received, Then revised sizes.
I'm giving 5 stars because item was of quality, and delivered to me with no bs delivery issues. It was a smooth process all around which let's be honest is a rare thing these days.

Lower price on hardware (metric lifting eye bolts) than my regular, local vendor. Shipping was reasonable for the heavy items I purchased.  I have bookmarked them in my favorites.  I will use them as my price comparison site to make sure I'm not over paying on hardware ever again.

Clevis pins were beautifully made. Accurate to sizes shown in the detailed drawings on the website. Using them for hinge pins inserted into bushings so diameter was critical. The drawings and the pins match so the hinges are precise. Nice and shiny plating. Great price too.
You sent the wrong part several weeks ago been working with your customer service and no credit for the wrong shipped part no return label.

The staff at Huyett is always helpful, courteous and a joy to deal with. The stock is always plentiful, and pricing is competitive. Shipping is quick and reliable. Shipments are always accurate. I've never had a bad experience with G.L. Huyett. The outside sales staff is always checking in to see what they can do for us and how they can serve us better. All around, a great company to deal with.

They have a good stock of stainless hardware which was easy to find on their site.  Reasonable value.  Order came exactly right & quickly.  Only odd part of the experience was checking out on their online store it took me an embarrassingly long time to figure out how to pay -- you have to click the little button that says 'add payment method', which was invisible to my rushed brain.  I probably shouldn't admit that...  Thanks, great store!

Had a difficult time finding a long enough screw eye for a hammock. Installation was going into a column that had 6x6 lumber structural member and brick laid around it (column was 18x18). Fortunately, Huyett had a screw eye that worked (8" shank). Worked perfect! Placed the order and delivery was on time.
Your website is so easy to maneuver-  I am Fred Flintstone's Brother and even I can find what I am looking for- But you do not accept Rocks for payment- :>)

They have one of the best ecommerce websites in the fasteners business.  It is easy to customize your orders shipment, including drop ship options.  When I do need to communicate with their sales staff, they are always friendly and thorough.  And of course GL Huyett has a ton of stuff it seems like nobody else has.

Huyett made improvements to their website and shipping procedures recently - I have to say; Much improved!  For example, in the past, shipping a heavy box was cheaper using US Postal service when it should have been cheaper using UPS.  Now, my last shipment was UPS, the right price and a much more secure box.  They got it right!

Web site is intuitive and easy to navigate.  Orders ship in a timely matter.  Tennessee location needs to package better.  Last shipment from them came in barely taped and parts were missing.  This is the first problem we have had with them in quite awhile.

On August 25th I reached out to Huyett. We were having problems obtaining specific nuts for our R&D Project.  Alexandra Melby took care of the situation by providing sample nuts. Also, Alexandra took care of getting our account set up through the accounting department.
Your sales team is amazing... always so helpful & knowledgeable. They are great to work with.

Your ordering system was a real pain in the ass for a retail customer but your employees seem to be very concerned to make every customer feel welcome and they are more than willing to help. Placing an order not so much.
This review is only on a few samples I received.  The adapters were fine and passed inspection.  I'm currently waiting for the order to be delivered-
Peyton went out of her way to make sure our order went out even after the UPS cut off, this saved me a lot of trouble finding what we needed somewhere else that late in the day.

G L Huyett is always on top of everything. When we need a quote, they get to us in a timely manner to be ahead of all other vendors. Their shipping is on time. We appreciate their customer service always.
Great product line

Awesome. I'm glad I found you, thanks Google. I have a large triangular shade sail, 20x20x20 heavy duty but good for our gusty winds off East Carolina shores. Sure enough,  we had a Tropical Storm, the cheap stainless steel twisted and failed. Looked at it like a Sailboat jib, found eRigging sail rigging, ordered, got it quickly and problem solved. I'm coming back for more. That and a cold beer, awesome! Thank you!

The haas products are great. The consistency and quality are impressive, as with about everything the price is high but as of now it’s worth it. You could offer some different style caps to cover the nuts. The one you sell are very nice but you could offer round ones. Idk

The 4" X 15ft slings and shackles came quickly and were well packed. This was our first venture into the sling world.  The slings were very well made and of a very high quality material.  For the price, they seem to be an exceptional value.   They worked beautifully on helping us turn over an 18ft wooden boat.

I needed 10 M16 metric lifting eye-bolts and not only did they have them in stock, but they were a more economical CAD plated instead of stainless steel that were sold at Amazon. Once I started shopping I found plenty of great prices on lifting hooks, swivel fasteners SAE eye-bolts and the hooks with spring loaded covers that I use a lot during the time I'm using cable to pull large logs out of my wooded area. Everything including shipping we're at much lower prices than I had been paying. I will certainly come back to E-rigging anytime I need rigging equipment, chain hooks and chain coupling links. This place was great as they had the metric Fasteners that I needed at 25% less than Amazon prices.

Great service from Carolyn. Companies loose business trying with all the new AI usage. E Rigging understands the importance of personal contact that will never be replaced by AI. I will continue to do business with E Rigging, Excellent pricing , quality products and great service.

These folks are on the ball. Found all the materials I needed to rig up a complicated netting system over a large organic garden to keep the pesky birds at bay. Everything in stock and ready to go with some of the fastest out the warehouse shipping I think I’ve ever experienced. E-Rigging is going in my rolladex under rigging and I can’t see why I need another company in that section. In a time where customer service sometimes seems to be a companies lowest priority, this group really impressed. I’ll use them for all my cabling needs.

Been looking for years to find replacement sheaves for rebuilding boat lifts, the ones I used never were quite Right. I have already did two lifts this spring and it was amazing to have the exact match OD, cable size and the bronze spacer all together, is amazing. Wish I had found E-Riggings 10 years ago. Plus the prices are less than half of what I was paying.
I required sixteen 6” x 1/4” ss eye bolts and ordered them on March 20.  They arrived yesterday (March 22) and are exactly what I wanted.  The price was competitive and the service exceptional.

Bought some table hinges.  These are the perfect size for folding cockpit or interior tables, and stainless steel versions at tougher to find.  When open, they are polished like jewelry.  They typically need some clean-up on the surfaces that are exposed when the table leaf is folded over, but that’s easy to fix with a stationary sander.  A very simple router template will allow you to make perfect pockets for the hinges.  Product was in stock and is now less expensive than the last time I purchased and arrived two days before the quoted delivery date :-)

Read the fine print on the returns policy!   Unlike Amazon, Home Depot, and others, they will not accept returns for spooled cable even though they sell it by "the spool". You will have to pay for return shipping, plus 15% restocking fee, and if you received it under "free shipping", you will also have to pay for any shipping expenses assumed by the company.  Policy states, "Upon inspection, the method of payment you used to make the purchase will be credited for the value of the item(s) less a 15% restocking fee. If you return an entire order that was shipped to you on a “free freight” basis, you will also be charged any freight costs we incurred."

Great selection at a fair price.  All of the hardware I needed to build a swinging bridge was in stock and shipping was quick.  Quality of the hardware seems good.  Website is chock full of useful information (thanks for that).
E-Rigging was the least expensive of all the companies I found and turned out to be excellent to deal with. They shipped the product right away! Great experience.

I set up a batting cage with cables, and all components needed to install and tension the cables. Great vendor made ordering easy and fast. Good documentation on how to pick and properly anchor the needed parts. I especially liked the regular updates on shipping status. Came when predicted!  A very good experience AND cheaper prices than Amazon.

Having waited until the last minute (senior moment), I was thwarted in my attempt to order a bunch of stuff by wicked fairies of the interweb.  I called customer service.  My call was met with the alacrity for which one could only hope in the pickle in which I found myself.  Order taken, goods sent and arrived less than 24 hours after the fairy invasion.  I regret my failure to remember customer service's name so that I might give personalized approbation to the lady that took my call.    Thank you.  Let's now see if I can put it together.

Why can’t you ship to Alaska? It is a stupid business practice that forces me, if I want your products, to have you ship to one of my relatives in the lower 48 so that they in turn can reship it on to me. STUPID!
Great service, fast delivery. Exactly what we needed.
Ordering was easy.  The order was processed promptly ensuring I could continue with my project on schedule.

I ordered rigging parts to suspend a tarp over the roof of a deck I recently built. The materials arrived exactly when they were promised. All of the materials were of high quality and worked exactly as envisioned.
Ordering was easy on the website and I received what was pictured on the website in timely fashion. Product I received worked as planned.

I would have given 4.5 stars if possible.  I have used American Frame before and was very satisfied with the entire design procedure and purchase.  I expect this purchase to be the same but have to mention that the inverted color of my photo was troublesome and required a little more work to get my design completed.  It instilled worry for me that the correct photo would be used.  Support was EXCELLENT though to ease my worry so I feel confident that all well be good.  I understand that this issue is being worked on so hopefully will be remedied soon.

It’s always a pleasure to do business with American Frame, and I’m always happy with the quality of the reproductions I have you print — although it’s a little disconcerting that the price of the service keeps rising. This time I also had a little trouble selecting the paper I wanted — initially only one type of paper could be selected. I had to back out completely and start over, and on the second try it did give me the paper choice options.
I like the reasonable prices and the selection of wood frames suitable for botanical art.

I have bought frames at AF for more than 10 years.Very high quality, accurate cutting and sizing. And the pricing is much lower than the brick and mortar shops. Some low level skills are needed to select frames and mats, and assembly is easy. Quality, consistency, and great service!

I like the multiple images of the frames from different perspectives. It's cool that they allow local, free pickup, although I am 100 miles North. I appreciate that no cookies are following me around the web to buy more. I like the website, and the selection too.
Nate was very attentive and helpful! His professionalism and the information and assistance he provided, over the phone and via email, made the process a good one.
The ability to put together exactly what I needed in an organized and clearly understandable way. I've done business with American Frame for many years and trust I'll get what I need.

Always perfect. I can count on your frames being correct and well joined. In the vary rare instance something is wrong, you’re quick to solve the problem. I’ve been ordering from you for almost 30 years!

Nathan Buswell was extremely helpful to me when I was looking for the right frame for my odd-size artwork.  He responded to my email right away and sent me a link to the exact wood I was looking for, and size frame I needed. Great customer service!
American frames have always come through for me. Their frames are made well and I have never had an issue with delivery.

I needed to see some frame samples for a piece I'm working on. The site has great photos and specs, and I was able to narrow down my selection using that. From there, I ordered several samples so I could actually get a feel for them and see how they would work with my piece. So glad that option is offered!

Ordering is easy, and it's possible to see a preview of the artwork in the matte and frame selected. I've ordered quite a few frames over the last several years. I did get one defective frame during that time, but it was quickly replaced by my just giving American Frame a call.

I have been purchasing frames for my watercolors and acrylics for years from American Frame. The quality is superb and the stock has always been exactly what I need. The cost is reasonable. One recent improvement is that the wooden frames now come with the acrylic, mat, and backing inside the actual frame that already has the points in place. I rarely have to add additional ones. Give them a try. You'll be glad you did.

I have been buying my frames from American Frame for years and have never had a problem. I understand that they are packed professionally and thoroughly. I just sincerely wish that the cheapest shipping charge was not $38! It’s made me consider not buying them anymore and research local framers.

American Frame offers the best price and best quality you can find. Even with those 50% off coupons at some of the chain framing and craft stores, you will always get a better deal at American Frame. I have only ordered their wood frames and they are outstanding quality.
Easy to follow instructions when ordering frame packages.  Have used American Frame for years and am never disappointed.

I have ordered four frames so far from American Frame. Each one was perfectly made. They arrived packaged carefully and were easy to assemble. The frame, mat, and acrylic choices allowed me to customize each frame to my exact specifications. And the prices made each one a good value. I will look no further for a company to build my frames. Highly recommend!

I can’t remember the young lady who helped me with my order but she was awesome,  She helped me look up frame numbers from past orders and made the whole process much easier than I expected. Robert Williams
Julie and Nate are always very friendly and they make me feel like I’m part of the family at American Frame and that they will take good care of my order and my needs!

The custom service was great, especially Nate who spent two days to find out why my place-order transaction couldn't go through.  The website was suck.  It couldn't accept my payment, with trials of multiple credit cards and PayPal.  The problem for the system turned out not to be the payment methods, but rather not accepting Chinese characters in the frame project titles.  It sounded I was the only customer, or the first one, entered non-English unicode characters in the system. The web should have given warning of non-acceptable characters in the entry process, not waiting until all the way to the end of payment step.  The other suggestion to the programmers would be treating non-English characters as "text".

I live on a WW2  Army base that was sold and converted into a residential neighborhood.  I recently found out that our drinking water is toxic, much the same as Camp Lejeune.  I purchased a water filter from Clearly Filtered for my drinking and refrigerator water and needed to make sure that their claims about their filter system were accurate.  Cyclopure provided fast, accurate and extensive testing that verified the new filter was completely removing the toxins.

The fact that your employee (Adam) is telling the customer's the truth about your product and not sugar-coating it with lies. Whenever a prospective customer is inquiring about your product features and what it is supposed to do relating to mitigating a contaminated private well with PFOS/PFOA/PFNA, etc., your employee (Adam) properly informs the prospective customer with facts.
Such a great experience. Quick send out and getting results was a quick turnaround. Thank you.
The figures provided a little hard for a novice to understand. I wish there was a “recommended” amount noted so would understand how our numbers stack up.

Cyclopure communicated well.  The specimen collection process was simple.  The instructions were well written and easily understood.  The whole process was much simpler than I anticipated.  The only suggestion Iwoukd make is to explain our results more completely.

Quick, easy process to order, collect sample water, and return ship.  Instructions were clear.  No issues at all.  Thank you for offering this service at a reasonable price and for streamlining the process.  Highly recommend!

Customer service was informative and willing to answer all of my questions, and they didn’t try to sell me a service I did not need.  I paid for the PFAS test and received it in 2 days.  I sampled my water and sent it back immediately.  Within 5 days my results were in my email.  I learned about chemicals in my water that I was unaware of.  I knew abt PFNA and PFOA, but PFHxA was unexpected and never reported on by my municipality as being a contaminant in our water.  The PFHxA level was more than double what the EPA considers as safe.
Great to know what is in our drinking water. Thank you for doing this!

I had to search your literature to find out what the things were that you found in my water.  I would have appreciated it if you could have directed me to information about the things you found in my water.

During the months of January and February,  we submitted 38 PFAS kits to Cyclopure for processing at the rate of 6 to 8 kits per week.  Results for each batch usually arrived within the 10 day period.  When we finally tabulated the results we found we were short 7 sets of data. I immediately notified Katie Casou who found the missing data and notified us within 24 hours. Great service!   RB Harris

Your kit is great, easy to follow instructions with everything needed included, even the return UPS sticker. The one suggestion is what the results mean for those contaminants that are highlighted but do not exceed the EPA safety levels. Does it mean that one drink of that water likely won't affect you but if you drink it daily over a period of years that may not be the case. It's just not clear what the results indicate for those contaminants that you highlight.
Reasonably priced PFAS test
Great value for a reasonable cost, kept us updated when they received our results, and got us our results promptly.
I made some mistakes in submitting my sample. The lady that called to clarify was extremely kind and patient with me.
Great follow-up by staff when I had trouble ordering test kit online. Received the kit, and results.

Easy to use & helpful results! testing PFAS with certified lab methods is pretty expensive. This test was much more affordable, and hopefully its innovative adsorbant method can be certified for use in commercial labs–because it's very easy and gives a great picture of a large number of contaminants. Report was easy to understand with helpful links. Thank you!
We love Cyclopure!  We have done ~90 PFAS tests through this company.  They are engaged, personally involved, thorough, and flexible.  Fantastic team!
The process was so easy from collecting the sample to sending it back with included UPS shipping label. They say results will come within 10 days and mine came in 9.
Very polite and helpful people, I did my testing and the results came back quickly. Thank you for the great service!
The instructions for taking the sample were very clear.  The results were as prompt as promised and the price was affordable.
Fuss free and documentation was complete. Able to make payment immediately and dispatched the following day. Thank you Marco
I have ordered from Seaboard Marine a few times now, and as I'm based in the UK you are never 100% sure everything will go OK, but Seaboard and their courier, Fedex, have never let me down.
Great customer service from Marco.  He helped me sort out an issue with my order and quickly located the correct parts for my boat.

The quality, price and items in stock is great. The web page is very organized and easy to find the many parts available. The Technical Support at Seaboard is exceptional. Last but not least - Avoid Amazon when at all possible!
Looks genuine .Quality and lasting products. One day I can buy from here , and shipment made easy . A trustworthy company.

Marco's customer service was exceptional. His prompt replies, his assistance with finding the exact pump I needed and speedy export was second to none. I cannot thank him enough. I found him easier to deal with and far more efficient than our local suppliers.
Thanks Seaboard Marine, Corey and Marco are excellent. Very helpful in ordering and shipping. Return emails promptly, and know their product. Capt.Lou, Marina Chorcha Fish Club, Chiriqui, Panama

Marco and the team at Seaboard Marine came to our rescue with parts for a new-to-us Grand Banks.  His help and assistance is making the purchase go through quicker and smoother; thanks to them we'll also have our spare part assuming the sale is closed, which we fully intend to make sure it does.
Marco was very helpful in finding exactly what I needed.And what I would say is that he did what he said he was going to do on getting my order out as promised.

I recently had to replace the turbos in my 31 Bertram. Not only did Marco get my replacement turbos shipped out to me quickly, but during the repair we found we needed new studs. Marco looked up the correct part numbers and when I placed the order on line with expedited shipping he had the parts out the door within minutes. This is why I continue to do business with SBMAR.

Seaboard Marine has been a lifesaver for countless boaters, myself included. Always have been a boater but purchased my first boat with diesels nearly three years ago. One of my fellow boaters introduced me to Seaboard Marine and I've been a loyal customer ever since. I have Cummins "B" series engines which are great but, as I read Tony's tips for them, have a couple deficiencies which Tony nailed spot-on! So now I've serviced my aftercoolers "the Seaboard way", am replacing fuel hoses, water pump impellers, water hoses etc. and I enjoy the informative articles posted for a variety of issues. Great job, happy to be a customer! Thank you for all you do!

Seaboard had the right hoses for my 6BT 5.9 gear cooler setup at a good price. Surprisingly the hoses are hard to find. I contacted their support team via the website to verify fit and Ken responded within a few hours. Great support! I also  greatly appreciate all the helpful information on Cummins engines and the forum via their website.

Was looking for a cross reference motor mount for an upgrade to an engine isolator for twin B-series Cummins. My initial call was to check compatibility, their tech took about a min to find and confirm compatibility and spoke with confidence. So, I talked with the shop our boat was going to they were not certain about upgrades. I then sent a detailed photos and info just to make sure Seaboard marine's SMX(Purple) mounts. Direct replacement for the Barry mounts; SMX(Purple has several upgrades to their version, with serviceable parts for future mount servicing, which was appealing to save a boat buck in the future. The Email rep replied in a short time, confirming in a positive way, and suggested to get order in so it could leave the warehouse before the 3-day weekend. Sure enough 5 pm the part was on its way.  Super happy with their service and innovation.
No better online marine part source and saves me from driving into the large dangerous city near where I live.

Seaboard Marine has been a lifesaver for countless boaters, myself included.  Always have been a boater but purchased my first boat with diesels nearly three years ago.  One of my fellow boaters introduced me to Seaboard Marine and I've been a loyal customer ever since.  I have Cummins "B" series engines which are great but, as I read Tony's tips for them, have a couple deficiencies which Tony nailed spot-on!  So now I've serviced my aftercoolers "the Seaboard way", am replacing fuel hoses, water pump impellers, water hoses etc. and I enjoy the informative articles posted for a variety of issues.  Great job, happy to be a customer!  Thank you for all you do!
Aways Great to work with. Ive been ordering parts thru Seaboard for many years. Always good communication and shipping is fast and resonable.

I needed an oil pressure sending unit for my marine Cummins engine. The local Cummins service center wanted $196 for the part but it was not in stock. The Cummins regional warehouse was also out of stock. Seaboard Marine got me the same part at less than 50% including the cost of 2-day shipping. Outstanding!
I would have given 4 and a half stars if that was available.

Thank you Marco and the team at seaboard marine for your efficient service. You made what I thought was going to be a tricky purchase into a stress free and easy process. Would highly recommend and will be using again in the future.

Had gotten just the bottle for the Envirovent before for my 6CtA’s, it was good by eliminating some of  the oil mist in the engine room from the Turbo and CCV filters. Had an exhaust leak that flooded the Airseps with dark smoke, so took part the Turbo, replaced the exhaust, cleaned and serviced the Aftercoolers and decided to remove the CCV and go with the Full Kit from Seaboard. Not a problem with good instructions, engine room is mist free….well mostly….lol.
Been buying thermal paper from TPD for nearly a decade.  They always have great prices and customer service.  Highly recommend!

Thermal Paper Direct is a great company to deal with .. They are very reliable and trustworthy … All my sales people over there are very professional.. Samantha is specifically great.. Thanks for all your service…
The sales person has all the information you just tell her what you need. She is great!

Amy was the woman that assisted me with my order . I asked her to duplicate my previous order and she did . When that order arrived it was the wrong size ( all my fault because I forgot that I had changed processor machine since I had last ordered ) she quickly and pleasantly helped me get it corrected , reordered and returned ! She was amazingly helpful to a computer stupid person (me ) she never made me feel bad about how I wasn’t able to help myself figure it out . WONDERFUL!!!!!
always have had a good experience with ordering and customer service.
Thank you for your prompt service always .
Super fast shipping, it seemed like it was only a few days before it was here.

The online order platform is user-friendly. It's always easy to order from the website. Shipment however is problematic. Our large shipment of thermal paper rolls was left outside by our garage door in open weather which could damage the packages easily, especially on a rainy day. Usually, our shipments are left in the front or back covered porch of the house.

Been using this product for 3 years Just had my tank pumped after 5 years and the septic guys said it was the best tank they have seen...meaning this product works! Our 25 year old septic system was in total failure.Replacement quotes given to us ranged from $30-$40,000.We decided to try the Bio Safe One products.Spoke with Chris who set us up with a nuclear shock treatment consisting of Bio 112 sludge remover,Boss powder packs, Bio Cube Powder Cleaner and 1 Bio Cube Red Brick Cleaner.Easily applied products! Within the first month the system had improved so dramatically!No more effluent backing up and the smell that had always lingered around our tank is gone!We had an area of standing water above our leach field which has now totally dried up.At month 4 we have a totally functional septic system.All we do now is add 1 powder pack per month to maintain the health of our system.At 1/5 the cost of a new septic system Bio Safe One has rescued our system.

I used this product back in 2008 and it cleared up my problem at home with no problems since. My church started having problems and had the septic tank pumped off a couple of times in the last 3 to 4 months. I remembered this product and told my pastor. He told me to order it. Overall the stencils worked well and were heavy enough to withstand some light wind. I also had to refer to the internet for a few measurements. The stencils do buckle after painting and in order to make the lines completely solid you have to use previously used stencils to fill in the gaps. It appears that the stencils will hold up to be used many times.

We used the shuffle board and pickleball stencils.  Both worked well.  Suggestions:  Do not use rollers.  Paint bleeds if too much paint on roller.  We switched to spray striping paint and it worked well.  Use a cardboard box with hole cut in bottom to spray paint.  This reduces overspray.  Because pickleball stencils, are very thick you need to use masking paper or drop cloths to catch overspray that comes out from under your spray box.
Very fast delivery and the quality of the product is excellent, haven’t use it yet but, i know it will make my job faster, easier and  professional !  I recommend it.

"Anyone who has an idea that they want to bring to life should most definitely contact My Product Today and take advantage of their expertise. Thank you to the whole team for all of their help and support."

Uplight Rentals will be my go-to for light rental in the future. Simple order and easy return process. Lucas was available and speedy to answer any questions I had. Will be doing business again in the future. Thanks for everything, Lucas.
UpLights looked amazing! Totally changed the look of our office party. Lucas was also very responsive in helping me figure out what kind of light and the right amount of lights to order.

This was one of the easiest rentals I've ever done. I received them on time, with clear instructions for how to package them back up, return label AND tape included (loved this), and send them back for return. Would recommend to anyone who needs lights for an event! Lights looked elegant and added a great sense of *magic* to our Winter Wonderland Corporate Christmas Party. Thank you!

Uplight Rentals is a great company to work with. I contacted Lucas at Uplight Rentals last minute, he said no problem and shipped the lights out to me right away. They came with extra cords, zip ties and everything we needed to put them up. The lights looked amazing and made our party a big success. We boxed them back up in the box he provided with a pre-printed label and even packing tape. It couldn't have been better or easier. Thank you Lucas.

Fast replies to my emails with questions when deciding on the light count. Willing to work with me on selecting the best light for my venue setup and factored in wired and wireless options. Timely email confirmations and clear follow communication. The lights arrived a day early than promised allowing me time to read through and pre-program everything. Packaging and return shipping provided. Easy to repackage and return at drop off point. I would use them again!

The entire process with Uplight Rentals was amazing! I noticed two days before our event that our original shipment was not going to be delivered until after our event. Uplight Rentals re-routed the original shipment to be returned to them and sent out another shipment that arrived in time. The lights added so much ambiance to our venue and we were very happy with the results. The return was very easy as well. Thank you for providing such amazing customer service! We will certainly be renting from them again.

Hosted a big wedding for my daughter. The hotel wanted thousands of dollars for up lights. Having previously owned a sound and lighting company I know that anyone can put out up lights. I found Uplight Rental and it was easy and professional. Up lights are dramatic in that lighting can turn any room from boring to intriguing.  The lights looked great as we set the color of the lights to accent the color theme. No power cords or DMX controllers all battery operated. This gives you flexibility in placing them and makes it so easy.  They saved me a ton of money and it looked great.

Uplight made it super easy and affordable to rent lights for our wedding. The customer service team was very responsive to questions about the best date to schedule our booking to make sure we got the lights in time for the event and getting extra extension cords. The lights were also perfect for our needs. We had a 30'x50' tent that we lit with 8 strands of globe string lights, and the brightness was perfect! The lights arrived on time and the return was also very easy. The only issue we had was that zip ties were not included in the box so we had to run out and get zip ties at the last minute, but that was minor to us compared to the overall experience.

I had no issues with ordering,recieving or shipping. Might have liked to get the lights a day earlier but it happens. Also was able to switch lighting to specific colors with ease. Most were already set but a couple needed to be adjusted. Took seconds. Definitely will use again.

if you are first timer renting uplights online and hesitating like I was, I think you should definitely go with this company. great service and communication. I rented a dozen of  wireless uplights from uplightsrentals.com for a wedding gig, there was no issue whatsoever from start to end. thanks!!
Lucas was great to work with! The transaction was seamless, lights were easy to use. I will definitely be recommending for future events!

I was so pleasantly surprised by the excellence of this service all the way around. As a mother in her fifties who didn’t believe her son that this would be a good way to have uplighting at the wedding, I can honestly say this was the easiest part of the whole thing. Great lighting, great customer service via email, and great price. Thank you.

It’s amazing what lighting can do for an event. If you want to take it to the next level but not purchase all of that equipment, UplightRentals just sends it to you and then gives you information to send it back when the event is over. It’s a win-win. We will definitely use them again. And customer service was top notch.

Great communication with fast response times. Could not have been an easier process. Our lights showed up right on time and they made the return process incredibly simple. Fantastic experience overall.
Easy and efficient! I also had a few questions throughout the process, and would always receive a response within the hour. Will definitely use again for all my up lighting needs.

I will ONLY use Uplightrentals.com for my events! I received them exactly when I was supposed to, they worked PERFECTLY and shipping back was ridiculously easy-they provided everything I needed-even tape! What an amazing company!!! Thank you so much!!!
Personable customer service and quick responses were very appreciated.  The lights were beautiful on my wedding day. It was worth every cent!

The lights were great! The shipping back was great! I would be mindful to have lights arrive a day before you need set up. This was my fault for not getting them sooner but I was able to get some lights up and they looked fantastic!

They were so patient and the lights were on time and made my wedding pop. The return process was easy. Everything about this process was easy going. Definitely highly recommended. So glad I went with this company price perfect as well

First time user. I ordered 20. It can look intimidating. It’s NOT. Took a minute to figure out how to program the color but after that it was easy. Set up, break down was a breeze. Allied Powder Coating did an excellent job of restoring our patio furniture. This included some minor frame repairs, powder coating the firepit table and chairs, and replacing the fabric slings. From the initial telephone contact, salesman, delivery men and final product-all deserve 5 stars. This was the second time my patio furniture has been restored by Allied Powder Coating. I SO appreciate all the ‘ease’ taken with getting my outdoor furniture powder coated! Allied made it so easy, the process only took me personally less than an hour total! Making the order, being there for pick up, being there for delivery! Simple!
Furniture levelers added without request

Great communication and customer service! Everyone at Allied was very helpful and friendly. David brought samples to my client's residence so I could select new slings. Dimas was very patient with scheduling, and kept pushing back delivery to give construction more time. Good service and a quick turnaround.

When completed everything is much better than when brand new, and in my experience does not degrade due to weather or anything else. Once powder coated, I have never had to have something redone. I highly recommend!

Great customer service from the initial sales man - David Wycoff, to the staff at the warehouse to the delivery process.  Kudos to management for hiring great people.   Would definitely use Allied Powder again!  The furniture turned out beautiful.
Excellent service from Allied Powder Coating! We have used them for 15ish years and never been disappointed. reasonable pricing and EXCELLENT work that makes your older lawn furniture look brand new.

BEAUTIFUL finish!! I’m SO happy with the results of my powder coating! Allied was completely professional - timely - communicated well throughout the whole process!! Thank you for restoring the beauty of my patio furnishings!

I was shocked that the Company forgot to inform me that the fabric did not come in for months . Affordable, precise parts shipped fast. The default lead time is a bit long tho.

Fast turn around time, parts were quick to go into production and shipped promptly! They arrived packaged very well. I will definitely use them again when I need another 3D print done. The staff was very prompt in answering my questions and helpful. They had an issue with my print and I revived an email right away letting me know it was slightly delayed, but it still arrived in a very readable amount of time.
My parts was produced very fast.The sizes are precise and the visual quality is just awesome! The communication was very pleasure and helpful. Very happy, perfect job, guys!
On time, on budget, great communication, great work. This was a test for to find a good partner - looking forward to keep working with you.

I was able to test the quality of your process and was generally pleased with the outcome. First, I did a one-piece sample and then followed it up with a larger group of pieces. The discount that was available at the time allowed me to risk a larger order. I wanted to compare with another vendor.
Great communication!  Very helpful and quick response.  Fast shipping our order was exactly what we expected.  Can't wait to do more business!!
Ordered rapid production and had everything within the week.

Always quick to ship, fabric always arrives carefully packed on rolls and is exactly as advertised.  They have the BEST remnant discount section, super fabric variety and great prices.
Great variety of product for composite work. Shipping charges are not in line with competitors selling similar products online.

Well I looked everywhere for 75" inch wide carbon fiber fabric this was the only place that had it the sheets where huge and flawless I messed up my project and had to re-do it Second sheet came flawless also. they ship securely, with this material costing 75$ a yard you can spend with confidence they will provide you with what your asking and top quality even though you will probably botch your own project because Carbon Fiber hates you. Great customer service. Package of product is perfect. Nothing every damaged. Service time from when ordering to whe I get email of shipment is excellent. Also prices are comparable to others or better but the services and lead times is really what brings me back.

shipping is way over priced,  basically charging double and that's if ordering one item. Their response is accurate, for example I purchased many things from them but they haven't made any mistake yet. The quality is good. I like they sometimes have a big sale. I am super satisfied with this purchase. I will recommend coverus.com to my friends and will for sure order more covers.  Very fast turnaround and easy and efficient ordering process. Thanks to a quality cover

I just bought an expensive machine ($6,000) for my office that I did not want ruined with scratch/ dust… I first ordered a generic cover from Amazon ( because it was cheap). The fit was horrible. A quick internet search and I found Coverus. I sent my measurements, I quickly ( within 2 hours) got a quote. It was followed by a personal email asking me some questions regarding the fabrication of what I wanted ( confirming the Velcro position). At that point I was really impressed. Delivery was fast and it fit perfectly. Great job!

Great company to do business with. This is my second order with them, and as with the first I received an excellent product. The cover is for an oval patio table and they requested a paper template of the radius points of the table to enable them to produce the correct shape. They succeeded, it fits like a glove. The owner, Malky is a great communicator and it shows in the end product.
3.5 stars

I thought I would give this a shot, didn't know what to expect. The cover came in the mail and WOW this is a real quality cover! I was a tool vendor back in the day and this was a MUCH better cover than I used to sell for about half price. Thank-you for a quality cover. It gives me a little hope that America can still make a quality product and offer a Great customer support. Good Job !
Great quality and quick shipping.

I made a mistake in my order because I didn't notice the quote did not include zippers before I approved it. I ordered a cover for an outdoor tool chest. The cover I received fit the tool chest perfectly and is made out of heavy duty waterproof material that will keep our tool chest and tools dry. I've ordered another cover, but this time with zippers. I'm not sure what I'll use the mistake for, but it is good quality and I'm sure I'll find something that is used less often so zippers are not needed.

This is the best constructed cover we have ever received from you and we have been customers for decades.  The seam at the intersection of the seat and the back makes the cover lie perfectly on the sofa.  Prior covers use to have to be forceably tucked under the back pillows and would come undone when someone sat on the sofa.  This seam allows the cover to lie naturally on the sofa seat without pulling out.
very easy to order on web page . very detailed being able to upload pictures or drawings
The ordering process was quite easy and what to measure was self explanatory.  The final product fits my tool box perfectly and the build quality is by far superior to most covers that I have seen.

Customer service was fantastic, helped me through the entire process, cover fits absolutely perfect, and it is made of really high quality materials. Super thick and durable. Will definitely be ordering my next covers through them!

Paid for a cover with a personal decal. Received it and the decal has a large cut in it. I’m assuming that’s why they sent a second decal, but if this company had standards they wouldn’t have sent it out as it is. I’m not impressed at all.
The cover I received came out great! Very happy with the final product and will definitely be using this company again in the future
they made sure they had the right measurements so the cover will fit properly. cover got delivered on time an how i expected it to be. kept me updated on process of the item
Fast and easy communication for order

We ordered these covers in the past (10 years ago) so we already knew they were worth their weight in gold. The new ones came fast, fit to specification, and so far seem just as well made. These covers have preserved our furniture and cushions in a near-new state through all four seasons, and every type of weather. I would order again and will recommend to my family and friends as well.
I just totally cleaned my toolbox did not want to try the cover on a dirty box, fits perfectly so make sure your dimensions are correct & you'll be happy with your purchase from coverus....

I had a great experience with coverus.  They gave me good input on my order which was great advise. They’re very knowledgeable about their products. They also have great customer service. Awesome company. Thanks
This is a great option for a chest freezer cover. We are very pleased with the product. It seems very high quality.  Production time was surprising fast.

I am very happy with the product !  My only advice would be to allow about 1/8 extra dimensions when ordering as it is an EXACT fit and can be difficult to get on.  Also an E-mail form the company as to the status of the order would be nice.  Otherwise  I am a happy camper !  Thank you

Did exactly what it is supposed to. I used it to mount a Holosun HS407C reflex sight on a VP9. Fits perfectly. I can now enjoy shooting a lot more with my aging eyes. Wish the HK optics plate could be cheaper, though.

The springs made a ton of difference.  Way better trigger; now, I get to spend another $95 so I can fix the trigger reset which is stupid long.   Maybe, just maybe, it would be better to install a wonderful factory trigger as opposed to offering parts for stupid $, that make the trigger worthy of HK’s name.

Having a one stop shop for everything HK is wonderful!  I made the mistake (only financial, it's amazing) of buying an Hk SP5, and then doubling that in accessories.  Items shipped relatively fast (we are all spoiled by amazon), arrived exactly as described and no issues at all.  Looking forward to building another Money Pit 5 and filling my cart at HKParts.net
Fantastic products and top notch customer service. Always looking for quality parts and this is the first site that I visit from now on.
Been buying parts from HK since before it was trendy 10 years or more. Its always been my go to for G3/MP5 parts and accessories. Great selection and prices.
Very fast shipping. There isn't a better website to find parts or accessories for an HK firearm.
HK Parts is my go to place for HK parts and accessories. Great selection, quality parts, and quick shipping. A little pricey but it’s true, you get what you pay for.
Delivery was prompt, and the part is a solid rail to attach my folding stock. I have no reservations about it’s performance!
They have very hard to get parts for high end HK guns . HK is a
In stock parts (magazines)
Website works well however, after I placed order, I never received a confirmatory e mail. Product arrived in reasonable time. Product as described.

Perfect description!  Fast delivery!  They went above and beyond to ensure I received my orders as soon as possible.  I couldn’t be more pleased with the product and service provided.  I will certainly be ordering from here, again, for any HK needs.

KCI 30 round blocked to 10 round magazine. I ordered from HK Parts online on Tues 3/19, arrived 9 days later on Thurs 3/28. Not too bad considering a w/end in between. I bought the magazine for use in my AP5 (MP5 clone) from Century Arms. Magazine fit and functions fine. I had to break it in by inserting/removing a few times, but now it's all good. Looks, fits and functions like an OEM magazine.
Ordered two items they stated 5 to 7 business days and that’s exactly when it came. Ordering online is very easy. Great products to dress up your HK.

The First Lady I spoke with was Wonderful, Every Call After That One, Where Very Nasty Young Women (As If I Was a Bother to them for Asking a Question Before Placing my Order) Almost, to the point of hateful. The First Order/Part was 'Out of Spec' QC Tolerance was Not Checked prior to Shipping. Then, (Like a Fool) I placed an order for Two more Items (Same Issue). I can Purchase these items from any number of different online Purveyors. LAST PURCHASE/NEVER AGAIN. Words Cannot Express my Disappointment & Discust with this Company. In Closing: READ THE FINE PRINT 'a 20% Restocking Fee'. Even if they send you the wrong part/item. I have 50 years of Firearm Knowledge.
What I love most about HK parts is the availability of YouTube videos as instructional aids, walking me through your products and services.
HK Parts has a vast selection of accessories and parts. The shipping was very quick and everything was there when it arrived. I would recommend.

H&K always makes excellent handguns and their other weapon components are top quality as well.  When I ordered the magazines they were shipped promptly and exceeded my expectations upon arrival.  I made sure they fit and proceeded to load the magazines up to become part of my EDC.
High quality parts, fast delivery, very happy with everything that I have ever received from HK Parts.
Had a problem with the compensator that I ordered for my HK P30L. Ashley responded immediately and had me send it back for a replacement. Great Service.
10/10 recommended!!!
the plan was very professional done. Looked fabulous.
Always deliver on time and very helpful with any minor changes. Ana is who did mine and she is the best!
Your website is user-friendly. I was able to change 11 x 17 to 8 1/2 half by 11 with a small charge. I got it in a very timely manner. I would certainly use them again.
I have used My Site Plan several times, for permit plans at work, and they are always correct, changes are made when asked. My Site Plan always comes through,  in a timely manner, and a good price.

They had my site plan back to me within 24 hours. Originally drawn up to scale 1" = 20' wasn't going to work because the city required 1"=10" they adjusted the drawing and returned it again within 24 hours. Nice job.
They were very clear on the instructions they gave me. They were very helpful and extremely quick to respond. Excellent customer service.
I love this site. I always receive the site plan right away. I like how they can draw in the proposed structure. Five stars for this site!
Jovan with My Site Plan is OUTSTANDING with our company’s simple pool site plan.
Your company made it very easy and fast for us to create a basic site plan for permitting a project
Prompt initial service as well as turn around time on revisions.
I couldn't have asked for a better experience.  they even redid it to add a few things that were required by my building department. My site plan did an excellent job

Overall a great product. We are still determining if all of our jurisdictions will accept this product. One item that needs improvement is ensuring the zoning setbacks match the actual jurisdiction. It appears that your default is the county zoning data when in many cases it should be a city.
Great job within extra short time. Perfect communication, they responded to my email right away and corrected all what I asked. I would strongly recommend them.
Fast, accurate and friendly service.

I recently ordered a medium site plan, and I couldn't be more pleased with the service I received. Not only was the delivery incredibly fast, arriving in less than 24 hours, but the quality of the site plan exceeded my expectations. The attention to detail and professionalism displayed by the team was exceptional. I highly recommend their services to anyone in need of fast and reliable site planning solutions.

Didn’t listen well to directions, I supplied a survey and got the basic plan, no other buildings were added to my site plan, only specific words on existing points on property pointed out via survey. From the very first attempt it was oblivious they didn’t read my instructions, second attempt was just as wrong as the first. Eventually they got it close enough. I wish I had not opted and paid for the rush it was a waste of money. left a review already. That one mysteriously disappeared although they responded to it so obviously they saw what I wrote, I’ll remove that part of this review when I see the original review. It’s a good service to offer that’s absolutely needed, I’d use again although I would expect what I experienced this go around repeated. Again it’s a valuable service. that said they need to do a better job. In the end my original survey served better than what was produced, all I needed was words on certain points. Unfortunately you can not legally alter a survey yourself. I updated my original review from 2 stars to 3 because they actually responded in a correct customer service manner.
It was easy, all I had to do was send the requirements of the HOA and it was done.

I order the site plan on Sunday and they send it to me on Monday morning. It was straightforward to order it through their website and make the payment. Very professional and rigorous. Ivan was very nice and fast in delivering the order. I am very grateful.

Customer support is perfect. I've ordered from Tokushu about ten times (maybe more?) and recommended them to others who have ordered even more. I never have heard of any issue. The sharing of knowledge and doing just a little bit more, stands out.

I highly recommend Tokushu knife! I recently purchased 2 knives from them and am very happy with the price and quality. The owner, Tony, even reached out to make sure everything exceeded expectations. Tokushu will be the first place a look next time when shopping for more knives!

Order process is simple and easy.  The knife ship promptly and the knife arrived in well protected package.  The handle a slightly lose after usage, reached out to Tokushu expert the Zach, he quickly respond and provided return shipping label.

I had a small hickup with my order and Tony made the correction and rectified the problem ASAP !! The knives arrived in pristine oder, blades and handles alike. Color me impressed !! I will be odering more knives from Tokushu, keep up the good work guys !!

I ordered a Dau Voa 350mm slicer. The first slicer I received was a 270mm slicer from them. Called Zach immediately after opening and they sent out the correct knife with a pre-label to send the other knife back.

I purchased a custom Wa DANIEL RYAN Alder Burl - Brass Spacer - Black Horn - 90mm - 150mm Blades handle to go with a TAKESHI SAJI VG-10 GOLD DAMASCUS PETTY 130MM knife.  Great looking combo and it is sharp.  Tokushu Knife provided an excellent purchase and great customer service.  I would highly recommend them.  Thank you
I’ve purchased several blades from Tokushu. When I first began looking into Japanese knives it can be very overwhelming.
Tony & Zach will ensure your experience was the best, no matter what it takes. I am continually impressed by their service and expertise. I would recommend to anyone.

I misunderstood the website description and purchased the wrong knife for my needs. When I reached out to the company, they were very kind and helpful, and helped me come to a solution that worked for me. Beautiful knives and excellent customer service. Highly recommend!

They work well and fast. I searched for an afternoon when I wanted to buy my knives, and I chose this shop because of the range of choice and the price tags. I found the same knives on other shops for 50/100€ more. Their shipping and handling was also superb. Bonus points to them for shipping with DHL, which delivered my package on a Friday instead of the ETA of the next Monday.

I have made many purchases from tokushu knives, and can't say enough good things!! Zack and Tony are great guys, who go above and beyond time and again to keep  there customers happy! Fast shipping, super secure packaging, and amazing selection of products!! I would rate higher than 5 stars if possible!!
Received exactly what we ordered in a timely manner. In addition we added the sharpening option and it was quite apparent that the knife has an extremely keen edge.

I received a beautiful knife with a small imperfection, if you can even call it that. I sent an email hoping just for advice on maintenance for it and not expecting anything else but an email with that. Anthony ordered a new knife to be shipped out before they even replied. Three incredibly easy transactions in a row, and for such a small team their shipping times are top notch.

I ordered a knife and got an e mail saying it was delivered, but it wasn't at my apartment, and it was nowhere to be found.  I contacted Tokushu to see if they could track it or find out where it was, and they just sent a replacement, which i did receive.  They were very helpful, I'd absolutely recommend them to anyone looking for a new knife!

They offer a superior product. They also offer the best customer service. PayPal had an older address stored, and, luckily I noticed it before the item shipped. I sent Tokushu Knife an email. They responded within thirty minutes and corrected the issue, which was actually my fault.
It doesn’t retain its sharpness, i had it two weeks and i can’t even slice a tomato without sharpening it on a steel
I am a little disappointed with the quality of the strop. Had a large indent in the leather. It looks used. Glue is all over where they glued the leather to the wood. It seems like it will work fine.

Custom handle install was great and the handle itself is perfect in the hand.  Tony went way above and beyond to hook me up with a Moon Pond from Nano-Hone as well.  Multiple orders now and never any problems.  Shipping is prompt and products are great!  Strongly recommended!
